11.content:
A sudden, crushing weight ripped you back to reality from your sleeping state. Rubbing your tired eyes, the face of the devil, AKA your twin sister Kasey, only in her underwear, filled your vision.

“Wakey wakey weirdo! Don't want to miss the last day of Junior year do you?” She asked, with her still sitting on your chest.

Rolling your eyes, you let your head drop back onto the pillow. Grumbling something inconsiderate, you pushed her off your chest. A smile formed on your face as you heard the thud. Climbing out of bed, you stumbled over to the bathroom, which your little brother John had just run from when he saw you coming. He hid around the corner, and you just sighed and shook your head. Walking inside, you clicked the door shut, then locked it. It became muscle memory to lock the door since John always tried to spy on you, Kasey, and your mother Ellis.He never seemed to in get in trouble when he got caught though. Mom would say that is was “just a phase” and continue on about her business.

After checking the room for any “surprises” he left and smelling the body wash for anything different, you turned the shower on, stripped, and began showering. The water was absolutely freezing, but you didn't really care. You finished relatively quickly, and dried off. With a swipe of a hand, the foggy mirror revealed the old, tired soul that was Sarah Mcbride.After drying your hair and face, and brushing your teeth you sauntered back over to your room.

10 mins later, you walked out in a pair of blue jeans and a black hoodie. Stepping into the bathroom to finish getting ready, a hand stopped you from progressing any further. Kasey was in her tan and blue cheerleader outfit applying makeup to herself, trying to mimic something out of a Glamour magazine. Even though you two were exactly alike in looks, you prefer not to be the “popular girl” that your sister is. The school was apparently doing some kind of performance for the senior walk. You weren't to sycked about the colors though. When she finished, you continued your morning routine of brushing your hair, flipping it up into a ponytail, then applying very miniscule amounts of make-up.

Completely finished, you walked down the stairs and into the kitchen. John was in his school uniform, eating some eggs while mom was cooking some more. Dad was in the corner table, talking on the phone with a client. Kasey was busy on her phone, probably texting her “friends”. Grabbing a small plate of eggs, you wolfed them down, and headed off to school. It was about a 15 min walk.

On the way there, you spotted Ashley and Jane walking ahead of you. From this distance, it looked as if they were holding hands, but you couldn't be sure. You asked them once if they were a thing, but before you could even finish your sentence, Ashley hastily denied it. They spotted you, and decided to stop and wait for you.

“Hey Sarah! Ready for today?” Jane asked, casting a friendly smile.

“Not really. I think i might have summer school, but i'm not sure. And Kasey has cheer practice all summer long… You guys excited?” you replied.

“Uh, duh… it's the end of the year.” Ashley retorted.

The rest of the walk was filled with conversations ranging from school to video games. Reaching school, you three split to separate classes. First was Chemistry, which you were currently failing. Then after that it was home-ec then gym.

Sitting down next to your lab partner, you could immediately tell that something was up. Her face was a sickly green, and she had a runny nose.

“Perfect, the weird girl is sick.” you thought to yourself. You removed your jacket, laying it over the back of the chair. The class had nothing to do yet, so you just laid your head down to sleep. A sudden “achoo!” erupted from beside you, and you felt blobs of something wet and slimy cover your arm and the nape of your neck. You slowly lifted your head out your arms, and saw the small girl covering her nose and mouth, her eyes wide and staring directly at your arm and head.

“Oh no… I am so sorry!” she began, but you just held up a hand, and wiped the snot off your arm and neck with your jacket.

“You don't understand though... “ but you cut her off, stood up, and left the class for the restroom.
--------------------------------------------------
The rest of the day was uneventful. You decided to skip the senior walk entirely, and just headed home instead. Walking in the door, you dropped your bag off in the living room, and proceeded up the stairs to your bedroom. Within a few moments, you had quite literally fallen into bed, and crashed. The next morning, you woke up feeling wonderful, except your view was all distorted. One side of your head was completely flat. Feeling your face, it was completely malleable. Oh shit. But you couldn't worry about that now because...

You rubbed at your squashed face absentmindedly, completely at a loss for what had happened. How had your face become so squishy and malleable? Was it something to do with that weird girl sneezing on you the other day? You had no idea, but to your surprise, your face slowly reformed back to normal over a span of ten minutes.

Before you could dwell on that any longer, your phone buzzed, and you saw a text from Ashley and Jane. They were on their way over, and would arrive in ten minutes. You quickly jumped out of bed, throwing on a red t-shirt and red shorts, before freshening up in the bathroom. You had just finished breakfast when the doorbell rang. Opening it up revealed your two best friends in the whole world, Ashley and Jane.

You had so much in common with Ashley and Jane, and you had known them for so long that the three of you were practically inseparable. “Hey girl! We match-batch!” Ashley giggled, gesturing to your own, all-red outfit.

“Oh wow. I guess we do.” You smiled, not quite in a perfect mood. The experience from this morning was still bothering you immensely. Jane picked up on your mood.

“What’s wrong Sarah?” She inquired.

“Huh? It’s nothing.” You lied, but then thought of a valid excuse. “It’s just…I have summer school.”

“You do? That sucks.” Ashley nodded.

“Yeah. Only in Chemistry, but still. It’s a pain. I’ll have to start attending soon. I DEFINITELY do not want to be held back a year.”

“Well, of course.” Jane laughed. “What we do without you?” Ashley and Jane walked inside, and the three girls headed into the living room. Your mom and brother passed you by, saying that they were leaving for the mall. They would be back later in the evening. You said goodbye to them and then turned your attention back to your friends.

“Does a movie marathon sound alright to you?” You suggested, trying to think of something that would raise your spirits. Your friends nodded in agreement, so you fetched a few DVDs from your personal collection. To start, you slid “Mean Girls” into the DVD player, and the main menu screen popped up.

“Wait a sec, I have to use the bathroom.” Ashley cried, dashing out of the room and heading into the bathroom. You and Jane shared a quick laugh. You sat down on the large couch Ashley had been sitting on, while Jane chose a plush chair in the corner. Moments after sitting down, her phone began to ring, so she excused herself and exited the living room.

Now that you were all alone, you couldn’t control your curiosity anymore. You poked and prodded at your face, feeling it squish and squash. With a bit of hesitation, you put pressure on your stomach, and it too began to flatten. You were freaking out at this point, but some strange sensation within you urged you to test out the limits of this new affliction that had befallen you.

Next thing you knew, you had squashed yourself down to only a foot in height, and you made up only a tiny bit of space on the wide couch. Also, your all-red outfit blended in almost perfectly with Ashley’s red leggings, save for the tiny tan blobs that were your feet.

121.content:
Right as you were about to start digging into your meal, you felt the urge to sneeze. A tingling sensation welled up within your nose, and your face scrunched up reflexively. After a few seconds of sniffing in air, the sneeze exploded out of your nose. You fell backwards from the force of the blast, only to find out you had misjudged how close you were to the edge of the table.

Instead of smacking against the table, your head and upper back slipped right over the edge. Unable to catch yourself on the smooth surface of the tablecloth, you tumbled down onto the kitchen chair waiting below. You landed roughly on your back, squishing slightly from the impact. More or less, you were unharmed though, and so you laughed the incident off.

“Oh wow!” Mckayla’s voice thundered, cutting your laughter off. “He made me breakfast. That’s so sweet!” Your wife giggled happily, and approached the table. She hadn’t seen your fall, and had no idea you were even in the room. You hadn’t expected her to finish in the bathroom and come downstairs so soon, so you hadn’t even planned for something like this.

Your chair was pulled back, and you looked up in horror at your giantess spouse. Her legs stretched on for miles, until they reached her wide hips and impressive ass. On the topic of ass, Mckayla’s was getting closer and closer as she bent down to sit in the seat, not noticing your body lying there. You opened your mouth to scream, but you were a second too late.

Mckayla descended onto you, and her plump rear squashed you like a bug. Your gummy body flattened out instantly, being reduced to paper under your wife’s weight. Worse of all was that Mckayla, in her haste to leave to work, false joy at interpreting your breakfast as her own, and large, jiggly ass, hadn’t even felt you. The only person who could help you had no idea that you were crushed under their butt.

You tried to escape, even though you knew it was futile. You couldn’t squirm, wiggle, or move at all. You couldn’t reform with this much pressure weighing down on you. You couldn’t talk, because your mouth was as flat as paper. Your entire body was as flat as paper for that matter. Since you had been on your back, your face was also pressed deeply into her leggings, and all you could see was darkness. All you could do was wait for her to stand up, and hope that the worst case scenario didn’t come true.

Unfortunately, fate had it out for you, and the worst case scenario came to pass. When Mckayla stood up, your flat body went with her. She had exerted enough pressure to partially stick your gummy body to her butt. She strolled to the front door, her ass and you wiggling back and forth with each step. As she headed out the door, your daughter Vicky descended the stairs and spotted you. She simply blew you a kiss and laughed.

Mckayla plopped down into her car faster than you could reform, forcing you to endure the fifteen minute drive to the modeling agency. During the trip, each bump in the road caused her to rise up and slam back down, crushing you painfully. With each passing second, you felt your body stick more and more to the fabric of her leggings. This was quickly spiraling into a horrible situation.

Mckayla reached the modeling agency, which was known as Sunshine Photography. Companies from all around the world would send their products to Sunshine Photography, and one of the many models who worked at the agency would take pictures with the product and send the pictures back. They charged a lot of money but most companies knew that Sunshine Photography was the best agency in the business.

As boring as the job was, Mckayla was able to find joy in other ways. The pay was through the roof, and more than enough to cover for the fact that you didn’t work. She also got to meet a lot of famous supermodels, and sometimes try out the products that were sent in from companies. Most of the time was relegated to desk work, and so that’s where she headed once she reached the agency.

As she strutted to her desk, you knew you had a very small window of escape. If you didn’t get off of her butt before she sat down, you would be trapped beneath your wife for hours, and would no doubt be engrained into her leggings by the time the day ended. This was not a fate you wanted to endure, so you squirmed for all it was worth, putting all of your focus into reforming.

1212.content:
You struggled valiantly against the grasp of your jiggly prison, knowing what your fate would be if you were not able to escape. You've been stuck to articles of Mckayla's clothing enough to know exactly how the process would go. She would inevitably wear you for hours and hours, until possibly noticing you, but even then her ditzy nature would likely lead her to forget about you once more and continue her unaware torture. You desperately wanted to avoid another of these situations so you focused what minimal strength you had into reforming. With each step of your giantess wife wobbling her ass tremendously this was no small feat, but little by little you felt your body peel off the fabric of her leggings. Just as Mckayla was about to reach her office, the last bit of your crushed body popped off! You fell to the ground, squishing yourself a bit more in the process but still in a mostly reformed state. You simply watched your gorgeous wife's buns rise and fall as they turned a corner and headed out of sight. Once she was gone you got back to reforming, and soon enough popped back into your normal, albeit 2 foot tall, human shape. At that moment you heard a feminine voice ring out behind you.

"What in the world" the woman behind you stated softly. You quickly turned around to face her, seeing a woman nearly as beautiful as your wife towering over you. She was a total bombshell with wavy blonde hair, blue eyes, and appeared to be roughly 6 feet tall. While her curves were not quite as voluptuous as Mckayla's, they were still overwhelmingly prominent, especially because they were being covered by only a small bikini.

"Hey there, my name is Tom, I'm Mckayla's husband. Long story short she, well, accidentally brought me with her to work today." You wanted to explain yourself as quickly as possible in order to avoid any confusion of why you were there.

"Oh! You're Tom! Mckayla's always talking about you! I'm Emily. Your wife has told us so many funny stories about the two of you" the model concluded her response with a stifled giggle. You hoped that this woman had not enjoyed Mckayla's stories about squashing you too much, but from the first impression it seemed like she didn't have any evil intentions towards you. You were thankful to have been found by someone who appeared to be nice, but before you could continue the conversation you heard a set of footsteps approaching you from behind. Your instincts caused you to quickly swivel around and face the direction of what sounded like high heels clacking on the ground, and behind you came yet another beautiful woman. This woman, dressed in a more modest skirt and blouse, was also holding a camera. You pieced together the obvious and assumed that she was the photographer, but you also couldn't help to notice that she was herself yet another curvy woman. She took another step and slammed her heel down mere inches from you, making your heart race. She didn't look down and addressed your new model friend, saying,

"Hey Emily, who are you talkin to?" The photographer asked, still unaware of your presence. In response Emily just pointed down at the ground. The photographer bent over slightly to see beneath her sizable bust. Quickly she saw you and her eyes went wide, it seemed like gears were turning in her head as she looked at your for a few seconds without speaking. Just as you were about to break the awkward silence, she said,

"You're just what I've been looking for!" You were puzzled yet at the same time intrigued.

"What do you mean?" You cautiously asked, part of you fearing what she would say in response.

"You're Mckayla's tiny, squishy husband right?! I'm asking because we just got a request for a photoshoot that involved a tall woman" she said pointing to Emily, "and a tiny guy!" she said pointing at you. You were a bit annoyed at her use of the word tiny, but had to admit you were a bit intrigued.

"Huh, really? What type of stuff would I have to do? Nothing bad right?" you asked back.

"Oh uhhh... no! Definitely not! It will be nice and easy, and we'll pay you the same hourly wage as your wife for the duration!" The photographer's answer seemed a bit suspicious to you, but the idea of bringing home a little extra spending money didn't sound half bad. You mulled the decision over for a few seconds before finally responding,

"..."

"Sure, why not! It sounds like fun!" You responded eagerly to the photographer. You weren't exactly sure what you were in for but this seemed like too good of an opportunity to pass up.

"Fantastic!" The photographer exclaimed, "Follow me and we'll get started right now." With a beckoning hand she motioned for both you and your new model friend, Emily, to follow her. Quickly the three of you began walking, you having to break into a light jog simply to keep up with the long, powerful strides of these women. As much as you tried not to you found it difficult to pry your eyes away from the hourglass shaped women sashaying in front of you. While they were wearing completely different outfits you could easily tell that both were overwhelmingly curvy. From your 2 foot tall perspective the asses of these ladies towered above you, and dwarfed you in size at the same time. After a minute of walking it seemed you had arrived as the photographer exclaimed,

"Right here, this room should be perfect!" As she said that she swung open a door to a relatively large, compared to you, room. Lights were set up all around and there were a few prop items strewn to and fro. Being the professional that Emily is she shot you a quick smile then sauntered to the middle of the room where all of the equipment was facing. She began double checking her hair, her makeup, and adjusting the fit of her bikini to make sure she looked perfect for the cameras. You, on the other hand, scrambled to make yourself look at least somewhat presentable. Thanks to your wife transporting you via the ass express this morning you had no opportunity to put on a normal outfit and instead you were stuck in some casual shorts and a shirt. The photographer noticed your worry and giggled slightly, before saying to you,

"You look great, Tim. Don't change a thing." She finished her compliment with a smile and you felt yourself relax a bit. So far it seemed like this would be a fun process! A moment later the photographer spoke up again, saying, "Alright guys, ready? The client really wants these pictures to emphasize the difference in height between you two so lets get you some heels, Emily, and we can start!" She tossed Emily a pair of tall, stiletto heels and she quickly put them on. As if her 6 foot frame didn't make you seem minuscule enough, now the top of your head only reached her mid thigh. Emily peered down at you to her side and giggled quietly, she completely towered over you. Immediately the photographer began taking a series of photos. Emily struck a different sexy pose in each one, and you tried your best to do the same. After a minute of this the photographer began giving some direction.

"Okay, Emily, can you turn around and kind of uhhh, hang your butt over Tim?" She paused briefly with the instruction, not knowing how either of you would react. Your instincts kicked in and started to tell you that this photoshoot might end up a bit more intense than you originally guessed. Emily, on the other hand, only smiled and nodding, immediately spinning 90 degrees until you were directly behind her. Her soft thighs brushed up against your face and you looked up to see Emily's voluptuous ass hanging over you like a canopy. Each of her cheeks stuck out so far that quite literally your entire body fit in the shadow they cast. You gulped and looked up in a mixture of awe and fear at the moons that could crush you effortlessly beneath them.

Just then the photographer said, "Yes! Great work you guys! The fear in your eyes looks so genuine, Tim, you're a natural!" You glance back at the photographer and shoot her a weak smile as well as a thumbs up, but inside you did not feel so confident. Emily seemed nice enough but she also seemed to follow the photographer's orders without question. You couldn't help but worry about what might happen next. The photographer took a few more pictures before speaking up again.

"Those were fantastic, guys. Now Emily, can you raise your heel and hold it over Tom as if you were going to step on him?" Emily responded immediately, "Sure can!" and quickly spun back around, her thighs brushing against you as she turned. She then raised her foot far above your head and held it there. While it cast much smaller of a shadow than her gargantuan ass, it still struck fear into your heart. Instinctively you ducked and raised both hands above your head, despite knowing deep down that this would do nothing in the event of her foot actually dropping down on you. The photographer snapped a medley of pictures in this position, obviously elated how perfectly the photoshoot was going. After a moment you lowered your hands, despite Emily's huge foot still looming over you. At that second the photographer said,

"Emily! Look how hot you look in these pictures! They're perfect!" She spun the camera around to show Emily and instantaneously your new model friend became enraptured by the photos. A series of "oohs" and "ahhs" came from both their mouths as they checked each one. However, in her fascination with the pictures the rest of the her thoughts melted away, and without a care in the world Emily dropped her heel straight down to the ground. You had no more than a split second to react before your entire body was squashed flat against the ground under her shoe. With an unceremonious *squish* sound, Emily stepped on top of you and kept browsing the pictures. Luckily for you, the ground felt oddly gummier than usual to her, and after a moment she looked down.

"Oh my god, Tom! I'm so sorry! I totally forgot you were still there!" Emily exclaimed down at you. Your body was comedically crushed flat underneath her but you could still hear the concern in her voice. She began to lift her shoe off of you when suddenly the photographer yelled out,

"Wait! This shot is perfect. Can you just hold it for one minute?" Emily was concerned about whether or not she was hurting you, but obeyed the photographer's wishes anyway. She snapped away taking pictures of your crushed form, of Emily, and of both of you at the same time. She even asked Emily if she could fake different emotions in regard to what she had done. Happy, angry, remorseful, Emily cycled through different poses and expressions while the photographer captured each one. Meanwhile your body was mashed and twisted up beneath her as she adjusted her stance repeatedly. It was absolute torture for you. You knew you should have turned down the offer in the first place, it was just too good to be true.

The photographer then spoke up and said, "Well if you two are comfortable with stuff like this, the client has an entire list of other squashing positions that they asked for!" She seemed excited at the prospect, and utterly thoughtless towards your wellbeing. You would have vehemently refused if you were in any position to voice your opinion at the moment, but sadly you could not. Emily, though, was flip-flopping on what she would choose. On the one hand she never likes saying no to her boss, but on the other hand she really did feel bad for you. She contemplated for a minute, tapping her heel on your body carelessly as she thought before saying,

"..."

122.content:
You grabbed one of the pieces of toast, and were about to bite into it when you heard a door open upstairs, and someone descended into the living room. Assuming it was your beloved wife heading off to work, you set your toast down and flashed a winning smile towards the doorway to the kitchen. However, it was not Mckayla who walked in, but rather your terrifying daughter Vicky.

“Well hey dad!” Vicky grinned, her expression sending shivers down your spine. “You made me breakfast. That’s so sweet of you.”

“Actually Vicky, that’s my breakfast and I…” You began, but your daughter cut you off by grabbing your throat. Your neck was squashed flat instantly, and the rest of your body soon followed. It wasn’t long before you were a tiny lump resting in her hands.

“I’m sorry. What were you saying? I couldn’t quite make it out!” Vicky laughed, and she gobbled up the toast and orange juice you had set out for yourself. When she had finished, she carried you into the bathroom with her, where she brushed her teeth and applied a bit of makeup. Lastly, she slipped on her shoes and grabbed her backpack.

“We’re heading to school now dad, and you’re coming with me.” Vicky stated, as if it was fact. The horrible truth was that you had no way to deny her wishes. She was stronger than you, taller than you, and admittedly smarter than you (or at least more cunning). “Mom won’t even have a clue!” Vicky crumpled you into a ball, and tossed you into her mouth.

Your body entered the hot, moist cavern of your daughter’s mouth, and her saliva washed over you. Her thick, meaty tongue lapped at your body, rolling you in circles. It wasn’t long before her teeth began to gnash and crush your body, painfully grinding you to bits. This wasn’t the first time your daughter had treated you like nothing but a piece of gum, and it surely wasn’t going to be the last.

Vicky headed to the bus stop, where she met up with her best friend, Lily. Lily was a toned and athletic girl, who never let anything get in the way of her and exercise. That being said, her body was a bit more curvaceous than one would usually expect from an athlete. She was a proud member of the soccer and swim teams, and Vicky would constantly get her to unknowingly torture you.

“What’s up girl? Ready for another day of school?” Lily asked as the duo stepped onto the bus and sat down.

“Oh. It’ll sure be exciting.” Vicky replied, her voice oozing with enthusiasm.

“What flavor of gum is that? It smells really good.” Lily sniffed the air, catching a whiff of what was actually Vicky’s strawberry mouthwash.

“I don’t know. It’s a subtle taste. Apparently, it’s my dad’s favorite flavor.” Vicky snickered, trying to hide the irony in her statement.

“Do you have any extra?” Lily inquired.

“Uh…not right now I don’t.”

“Oh. That’s too bad.” Lily frowned, and the bus began to pull up to the school.

“Weren’t you looking for a new swim top?” Vicky mused. “Did you ever find one?”

“I didn’t.” Lily sighed. “I can’t seem to find one that fits my exact measurements. I want it to be tight fitting so that my boobs don’t get in the way of my swimming. BUT I don’t want it tight enough so that it hurts. That would be distracting.”

“I got ya.” Vicky nodded. The bus came to a stop, and everyone piled out. Vicky waved goodbye to Lily, and headed off to her first class. As she passed the bathroom, she walked inside and spat you out. She washed you in the sink for a few minutes, until you were nice and squeaky clean. Because of all of her crushing you had endured, your clothes had been torn to shreds, and so you were now a naked ball of gummy, hoping and praying for mercy from your giantess daughter.

Vicky glanced down at you, ideas spinning in her head about what to do with you. Lily had just presented some very tempting offers, but Vicky did enjoy getting some time with you herself. Eventually, she reached a decision, so what does she decide to do?

Your kids are relatively self-sufficient so they do not need too much help with their daily routine unless something drastic happens, so you could do whatever you wanted. You decided to take care of some housework, and you were going to start with cleaning up Mckayla's exercise room.

You started your short trek down the hall and eventually got the door. Looking at the door knob looming far above, you had to get up there and reach it. You could have squeezed yourself under the door but you spend so much time squished by your beautiful wife that the prospect of inflicting it on yourself was not too tantalizing. Luckily, just like you scaled the cabinets earlier you could climb the door frame with ease and use your minimal strength to swing open the door. You sat there in the room, taking a moment to pat yourself on the back for being so self-sufficient at only two feet tall. Most people at your diminutive stature are totally dependent on others to help them live out their daily lives, but you take pride in being able to fend for yourself. In fact, it is this exact confidence and capability that led you to win over your beautiful wife when you met over twenty years ago. Before delving into the cleaning process you felt your mind start to drift to that wonderful day...

It was a warm spring day, and you were walking through the city from your college campus to your internship. Always the go-getter you chose to attend college in a relatively metropolitan area, something rather risky for a two foot tall squishy man to undertake. The seemingly endless seas of oblivious pedestrians seemed like it would be the worst situation for you to be in. One misstep and you could be thoroughly squished by a a looming foot. But you were not the average squishy man. Through this mass of people oblivious to your existence, you bobbed and weaved between steps, under legs, and expertly avoided danger. In fact, you could likely move about at an equal pace to these giants thanks to your nimbleness.

On this day, however, you found yourself walking behind someone that you simply could not take your eyes off of. A pair of creme colored heels led into some of the longest, most beautifully tanned legs you had ever seen in your life. Each elegant stride of hers equaling more than 5 steps of your own. Your eyes were naturally drawn upwards, following the smooth contour of her legs, and what lied above them could only be sufficiently described as the best ass you had seen in your entire life. You were immediately mesmerized. First, it was large, very large. The width from the edge of one cheek to the other was easily wider than your entire body was tall, and it stuck out like a shelf. Second, it jiggled just the perfect amount in front of you with the clack of each heeled step on the pavement. And third, her short forest green dress struggled valiantly to contain this massive body part but simply could not succeed. Every step revealed just a hint of her smooth cheeks that was only visible from your perspective, but enough to entrance you even more. She would grab the dress and yank it down every few steps but the process kept repeating itself. It was during one of these forceful tugs that this beauty happened to knock her purse off her shoulder, causing it to land right in front of you. You immediately grabbed the purse off the ground and lifted it up, just then realizing that this woman did not even notice dropping her purse, and neither did the number of pedestrians around you. It seemed a bit strange that she was ditzy enough to not notice her own purse falling off her shoulder, but you brushed those thoughts aside, this was your chance!

In the seconds that had passed she had gotten a fair distance ahead of you, and you had to figure out how to not only catch up to her but get her attention in an appropriate manner. Because, at two feet tall your voice would likely not rise all the way up to her ears over the bustle of the city. And further, the difference in height between you two meant that you could only reach her calf, thigh, or tremendous ass to get her attention physically, and you did not want your first interaction with this goddess to be groping her. Thinking on your feet you quickly ran forward to scale a nearby newspaper dispenser, leapt from there to a street sign, and ended up atop a bus stop some feet ahead of this beauty. From there you scanned the crowd looking for her, and you found her almost instantly. Standing above nearly every other person in the crowd was an angelic face that could only belong to the perfect ass you had seen before. She had to have been at least 6 feet tall, before counting the extra height her heels added, and looked like a model to you. She approached you and you shouted out, "Excuse me miss, I believe you dropped this" while holding her bag out. A look of complete surprise washed over her face, first to see a man less than 1/3 her height speaking so confidently, and second to see you holding her purse. She exclaimed, "Oh thank you so much it completely slipped my mind!" with a short giggle. "What can I ever do to repay you?" she continued. In one motion you flipped yourself into a hanging position from the bus stop you were sitting on, and came to her eye level. "You can let me take you out to dinner" you said smoothly as you extended a business card to her beautiful hand. Clearly taken aback slightly by your advance, she then formed a perfect smile and responded, "I would love to." She extended the same hand and said "Mckayla Jacobson, pleasure to meet you," you took two of her fingers in your much smaller grip and responded, "Thomas Malthus, and trust me the pleasure is mine. Does tonight at 7:00 work for you?" She smiled again and nodded, you smiled back then each of you continued on your daily life. You worked out the details of the date over the phone later, and from that point on the rest was history.

You could spend the whole day recalling the wonderful history of you and Mckayla, the times she accidentally sat on you, stepped on you, even forgot about you after doing the first two. While your natural agility let you avoid many dangerous situations, when it came to your wife it seemed like you simply could not focus on avoiding her. Her natural beauty seemed to hypnotize you and lead to you being squished against her one way or another. Each of these times though, while not physically very enjoyable only served to strengthen your relationship and forge the bond between you and your beautiful wife. You both made each other happier than ever before, and is the reason why you have had such a loving marriage for over 17 years.

*Back in the real world*

You came out of your daydream content, and ready to start your day. This is when you first noticed just how messy the room was. While Mckayla was in no way a gross woman, she was definitely passionate about maintaining her figure through intense workouts. Combined with her natural ditziness and oblivious nature, this led to her leaving this room looking like a tornado hit it. Pairs of sweaty high socks were strewn about, one sock you specifically remember sharing with Mckayla's large foot while your wife ran a local marathon. You shuddered, not wanting to take that trip down memory lane and looked around the rest of the room. Dumbbells were spread out, running shoes left tipped over, even a pair of leggings shed on the ground because your wife frequently gets "too sweaty to workout with pants on" as she puts it. And in the middle of the room laid your wife's very much broken in yoga mat, still a bit damp from her session last night. Just as you were about to get started you heard your wife's voice from upstairs,

"Honey! The girls at work are out of town today so they told me I can have the day off! I think I'm going to work up a little sweat then we can do whatever we want!" You heard your wife's footsteps as they came down the hallway and hoped that she had not put her headphones in already. When she did she tended to get into the zone and it was nearly impossible to get her attention if she wasn't looking for you. She stopped briefly to ponder why the door was already open, and you were stunned by her beauty yet again. She had thrown on a sports bra to accompany her leggings, but neither did much good at pinning down her ample curves. It was then you noticed she did already have her headphones in, and you gulped, hoping that she would notice you before starting her routine. But this time, to your surprise, actually saw you! "Oh hey Tom, what're you up to?" She said while removing the headphones from her ears. You responded, "Nothing much, just gonna help you pick up a little bit around here!" Mckayla smiled back and said "Aww thank you, you really are just the sweetest. Well now that we're both in here...

“Hey honey, when was the last time we watched ‘Parks and Rec’?” Mckayla asked, drying herself off. You stood by her feet, using a much smaller towel to dry yourself.

“I don’t know.” You answered. “I think it’s been a while.”

“Why don’t we binge? That would be fun!”

“I guess. All day?” You inquired, deftly dodging to the side as your wife dropped her towel to the floor. She always dropped her towel after drying off, and so you had learned to dodge out of the way. Otherwise, Mckayla was prone to picking up the towel, squashing you in the process, and then tossing the towel into the washing machine with you stuck to it, with Mckayla none-the-wiser.

“Yep! It’ll be like a little party, just the two of us!” Mckayla stepped towards the bathroom door, and you rolled out of the way of her foot. She left the bathroom and went back to your bedroom, and so you trailed behind her. The two of you got dressed, with you slipping into white shorts and a white t-shirt, while Mckayla just clipped on a red sports bra and tan leggings.

Mckayla then picked you up and carried you downstairs, setting you down on the couch. She sat down beside you, sitting on one half of the cushion while you sat on the other half. She flicked on the TV, changed over to Netflix, and then started up the episode that you had left off on. She flashed you a beautiful smile as the episode loaded, and then your binge session began.

The hours sped by, filled with laughter and fun. You cuddled up next to your wife’s thigh, sighing as her body heat emanated off. Her jiggly flesh gave way slightly, and it was an extremely comforting sensation. Mckayla gently rested her arm around you, caressing your chest with her thumb as you watched the TV. You lightly kissed her hand, and once more wondered how you had ended up with such an amazing spouse.

“I’M HOME!!!” An extremely loud voice suddenly cried out, causing your heart to skip a beat. Mckayla let out a brief squeal, and her arm instinctively tensed up, causing her to partially squash your face. Mckayla turned around to see Vicky walk into the room and set her backpack down.

“Goodness darling. Can you be more quiet next time?” Mckayla sighed, releasing her grip on you. For safety, you scooched a few inches away from Mckayla.

“What are you watching mom?” Vicky walked further into the room, standing behind the couch.

“Your father and I are catching up on ‘Parks and Rec’. Why?” Vicky looked down and saw you. For a brief moment, an unsettling grin flashed across her face.

“Oh hey dad! Didn’t see you there!” Vicky smiled, the perfect picture of innocence. “Can I join you two?”

“Well…I don’t know if…” You began, but Mckayla didn’t hear you, so she cut you off.

“Sure thing Vicky. Have a seat!”

“Thanks mom!” Vicky giggled happily, and she flipped herself over the edge of the couch. You had to almost jump out of the way to avoid her landing right on top of you. As Vicky adjusted herself, you found yourself with almost no room to move. Mckayla’s thigh and Vicky’s thigh pressed against you from both sides, and you found your arms partially smushed between the two curvaceous females.

“Wait a second!” Mckayla cried, jumping to her feet. “I should make some popcorn! Be right back!” With that, your wife dashed out of the room, and disappeared into the kitchen. You watched her go, and then felt a sharp pain as your head was suddenly crushed flat. The rest of your body soon followed, until you were nothing but a tan lump resting in your daughter’s hand. She had got you again, just as you feared she would.

“I’m sorry to interrupt this cute little bonding time dad, but this opportunity is too great.” Vicky smirked, absentmindedly rolling you between her fingers “In fact, why don’t we make this even more intimate, huh? That’ll be fun!” Vicky leered, smiling from ear-to-ear like the Cheshire cat. You struggled against her grip, but it was no use. You were completely at your daughter’s mercy, which was practically non-existent.

After another minute it seemed she found the video. Exclaiming "Aha!" Mckayla grabbed it from the cabinet and walked it over to the small tv in the room. She bent over putting the video into the player, waving her enormous buns in your face one last time. Feeling flirtatious you stepped up on your tip-toes and planted a passionate kiss right in the jiggly flesh of her left buttcheek. Mckayla, surprised by your tiny kiss, let out a short gasp before pushing her buns back into your face. You felt the force of this playful bump from your wife almost knock you clean off your feet, staggering to catch your footing. You snapped out of you infatuated gaze and remembered just how much more powerful Mckayla's ass was than even your entire body, and took a step to the side. Soon enough you heard the cheesy exercise music start up your wife bounced backwards, flying past where you were standing a mere second ago. You were thankful that you moved a bit to the side because the booty bump you narrowly avoided could have easily sent you launching across the room. You looked up at your beautiful wife and she looked back at you, asking, "You ready?"

The exercise started off slowly enough, with some jumping jacks. You quickly began the routine and felt your blood flowing, not only from the exercise but from the close proximity to your giantess wife who had already placed 100% of her attention on her workout. You watched Mckayla's body bouncing outrageously with every repetition, also noticing that she had quickly built up her usual layer of sweat. Mckayla was evidently very into her workout as her left foot strayed closer and closer to you with every jump. Quickly, the video moved on from jumping jacks to squat jumps, and you heard your wife groan. Despite your wife being in wonderful shape, it seemed like certain exercises made her much sweater and more exhausted than usual. You on the other hand, we're breezing through the workout. Your incredibly light weight combined with moderate athleticism made bodyweight exercises like this one much easier than they are for your voluptuous wife. In fact, sometimes it seemed like the junk in her trunk combined with her enormous bust were what contributed most to this problem.

On one particularly emphatic squat jump, Mckayla put all of her energy into it and leapt high in the air! You were amazed at her ability for a split second, but almost immediately you noticed a large shadow looming over the exact spot you were at! You looked up and saw a meteor-sized shoe hurtling towards your tiny defenseless body. Mckayla was about to land right on top of you! You leapt as quickly as you could from the landing zone of her huge foot, but only your upper body was able to escape. Her full weight came down on your legs, crushing them flat onto the ground beneath you. Mckayla felt something squish beneath her foot and paused, looking down at you.

"Hah, laying down already? Come on Tim I know you can keep up!" Mckayla said haughtily down to you, completely unaware that she was the sole reason you were laying down. You shouted back, "MCKAYLA I'M NOT TIRED, YOU JUST CRUSHED MY LEGS" for once shouting loud enough to get her attention. Mckayla looked down and said,

"Oh shoot! I'm sorry Tom!" and stepped off you. Luckily you had only been squashed for a second and you reformed almost immediately. You stood back up and resumed the workout. Quickly, the workout swapped exercises yet again, and you heard the commentator on the video say, "Time to work those abdominals!" You head Mckayla groan very loudly up above you, abs being her least favorite body part to work out. Mckayla looked evidently tired, but she said down to you,

"Hey Tom if you want to call it quits I totally get it, I mean I'm doing great I'm just making sure you're okay." You saw through your wife's obvious lie and chuckled. In reality, you were handling this workout much better than her, but just then you realized the second reason why you don't like to workout with Mckayla much...she was insanely competitive. In addition to the usual threat of you wife bouncing around you getting caught up in her exercises, working out with your wife almost always had to end with her "winning" in one way or another. For some reason she always had to beat you in whatever you guys were doing, even if that meant she had to take drastic measures... This competitive nature of hers lead to some of the only times that you can remember your wife intentionally squashing your minuscule body. Of course, she never was malicious with these squashings, but nevertheless they weren't out of the picture when "victory" was on the line for Mckayla.

Despite this knowledge you were feeling a bit cocky. Not only were you enjoying the workout but in your mind you could impress Mckayla with your apparent athletic ability. So quickly you responded, "No way babe! I've barely even broken a sweat, unlike somebody!" Mckayla gasped, and you saw her brow furrow with determination. You gulped as you realized that provoking your wife's competitive nature might not have been the smartest move, as the video commenced part two...
1252.title: "Do you want to work out with me?"

choices: Her friends love the costume so much Mckayla wants to wear it all day and night!
Mckayla squashes your mouth with her butt somehow and forgets all about you
You two don't even make it to the party (or writer's choice)
12523.content:
As the two of you prepared both mentally and physically for what was to come in part two of Mckayla's workout video, you began to second guess your idea of getting into a competition with your wife. You knew just how competitive she could get, and the more you thought about it the more nervous you became about this whole situation. Looking upwards you saw Mckayla wipe a shocking amount of sweat from her face and then take a large sip of water. At this point as much as you liked the fact that your minuscule stature was actually useful for something, you were still praying that anything would get you out of the second half of this exercise video. And for seemingly the first time in your entire life a stroke of good luck fell upon you!

*RING* Mckayla's phone rung out loudly and your face lit up with joy. Quickly Mckayla paused the video and went over to answer. She picked up the phone and held it to her ear, you couldn't hear what the other line was saying but as Mckayla's eyes went wide you knew that it was something worthy of bailing on this workout. You breathed a massive sigh of relief knowing that this situation which surely would have ended poorly would be avoided. Just then, Mckayla finally responded,

"I can't believe I forgot about the costume party! We'll get changed and head right over!" Mckayla said giddily into the phone before swiftly hanging up. Immediately she turned and looked down at you behind her, speaking up again, "Some of my friends from work threw a costume party on our day off and it's starting right now! It must have completely slipped my mind!"

You smile up and respond, "Oh I had no idea either! I don't have a costume or anything!"

Her smile growing even wider and more radiant, Mckayla responded, "Don't worry a thing, honey, I got us a couple's costume this year! I'll be right back I'm going to go get it!" As Mckayla finished her exclamation she skipped out the room, stepping directly over you as you passed between her legs. As her massive body flew over yours you felt a bit demeaned, as usual when your two-foot body was put into a situation like that, but you knew that Mckayla never meant to hurt your feelings in any way so you brushed it off. Moments later you heard loud footsteps booming back down the hallway into the room and your wife's gorgeous, albeit still sweaty form appeared in the doorway. She quickly unfolded the fabric she had in her hands, revealing a large, light brown piece of cloth shaped like an animal of some kind. Seeing that you didn't recognize the costume immediately, Mckayla spoke up,

"It's one of those two person horse costumes like the ones in cheesy TV shows! See?" At that point you finally recognized it in her hands, seeing clearly what she was talking about. It did look just like one of those stupid costumes that characters in old TV shows would use to try to sneak into places, and you couldn't help but laugh slightly. At least, you laughed for a second until your sixth sense for bad situations started to creep in.

"Hold on one sec, Mckayla, am I in the front or..."

"You'll go in the back! Here hop in hop in! We're going to be late for the party if we don't hurry!" Mckayla quickly opened up the costume to reveal the interior to you. You desperately wished to protest but you could tell that Mckayla really wanted to get to her friend's party. Biting your tongue you climbed into the opening and stepped through the part Mckayla would wear and into the backside. Sliding your feet to the bottom you then stood up in the rear of the costume with a mountain of fabric hanging in front of you. Oddly enough when you stood up it seemed like the costume fit you exactly right, which was a rare enough experience for you to be able to recognize it immediately.

"Uhh, Mckayla? Two things. First of all it's pretty dang hot in here. And second of all... the suit is my size, there's absolutely no way you are going to be able to fit into it." You said through the layer of cloth. Mckayla was confused for a moment before examining the package she took it out of, reading it out loud.

"Two person horse costume... for children." She said while slapping her forehead for not reading carefully enough. As she stood there thinking about alternative ideas, a flash of inspiration hit her. "Wait, a second, Tom! What if I just wear the costume up to my waist like some sort of badass centaur or something! Wouldn't that be cool?"

Thinking about it for a second you weren't considering what that would mean for you and you mindlessly responded, "Yeah actually that would probably look great!" Mckayla jumped with joy as her costume ended up working out after all. She quickly tossed the package aside before beginning to strip down her sweaty workout clothes all the way down to her bra and panties.

"I hope you don't mind that I took my clothes off, Tom, if it's hot in there like you said then I don't want to get all sweaty." The truth was that ship had long sailed, but before you could even respond you felt your wife lift up the fabric in the front and slide one of her meaty legs into the opening. Instantly she felt the suit material tight around her legs, but it seemed stretchy enough to accommodate her lower half at the very least. Mckayla then stepped her other leg in before attempting the monumental task of pulling the suit over her ass. The upper body and head of the suit hung loosely above you on the outside and wasn't really even noticeable compared to the spectacle that was Mckayla squeezing into a children's costume.

You, meanwhile, could only feel the fabric moving around you as you were stuck in the relative darkness of the rear section. The material allowed some light to permeate through the costume so it wasn't pitch black, but it still wasn't easy to see at all. Just then, however, the opening in front of you was lifted up towards the light and you could see clearly for the first time. However, the image that became clear to you was one you could probably draw from memory alone after so many years of marriage, the enormous ass of your wife. Just as quickly as you gained vision you lost it though, as her cheeks began to force themselves into the small opening of the suit. In an instant you felt the temperature inside the suit rise what felt like twenty degrees. Mckayla's rump was still very sweaty from the workout you two just completed, and as a result the tremendous heat it gave off turned your couple's costume into a personal sauna. You could feel the heat source getting closer and closer to your face as you attempted to back up and counter its advance. But quickly you felt the back of your head hit the back of the suit and you knew that there was no more retreating. With one final "Hmph" coming from your wife's mouth above you as well as a mighty yank on the suit, it finally slid past her but cheeks and secured itself tightly around her waist.

Mckayla breathed a sigh of relief before glancing towards the mirror on the opposite wall of the exercise room. She gasped before saying, "Tom! This costume looks so cool! We look fantastic!" While you appreciate her including you in her statement, for all intents and purposes she looked fantastic, you were barely even visible. And as Mckayla was having the time of her life checking herself out in the mirror, you were suffering a much worse fate in the hindquarters of the costume. As you could have easily predicted, Mckayla's huge ass filled up significantly more than the half of the horse that it should have, spilling generously onto your side. At your current state her bare buns were mere milimeters in front of your face, you could tell sadly by the smell of sweat and heat radiating off of them. Luckily, however, you had not been squashed quite yet and you used this opportunity to speak up to your unaware wife.

"Yeah, so, Mckayla? You know I love your butt more than anything, but right now it's kind of invading my personal space." You reached up and poked her jiggly cheek with a finger before bringing your hand back down to your side. You thought about mentioning how sweaty and gross it was too but you never liked making your wife feel self-conscious about anything, even if it meant you had to suffer a bit in return. However, it seemed like your tone wasn't quite serious enough as Mckayla laughed in response,

"Oh is it now? Well what if I said you were the one invading my butt's personal space, huh?" Mckayla said cutely while shoving her butt backwards emphatically. Immediately you felt her warm, sweaty cheeks press your face into the back of the costume for no more than a second before returning to their resting place in front of you. You were about to reiterate the fact in a more serious tone but then Mckayla spoke up again, "Just kidding, sweetie. I know being a horse's ass isn't an ideal costume, but don't worry I won't make you stay in there for too long! Just long enough for all my friends to see, sound good?"

You breathed a sigh of relief at that at least, hoping that she would stay true to that word you responded, "Yeah, sounds great, now let's go strut our stuff at this party." Mckayla smiled before reaching a hand back and patting your head through the fabric of the suit, unintentionally pressing your face into her ass once more before beginning to walk. Initially you were afraid you wouldn't be able to keep up with your giantess wife's pace, but the silver lining of having her ass in your face meant that as she flexed her muscles to take a step each cheek would alternate rubbing slightly against you. Quickly you got used to this motion and began to be able to predict when she would walk based on the slightest flex of her glutes. It wasn't a situation you were particularly proud of but it was better than tripping up behind her! As the two of you walked out of the house you thought to yourself that maybe it wouldn't be such a bad day after all... but you weren't entirely sure.

125231.content:
As you felt yourself being dragged along out of the house with your wife, you began to question your decision to go along with this plan. At that very second you were surprisingly unharmed, simply following the pace of Mckayla's steps and taking care not to make any contact with the ass that filled up quite literally your entire field of view. You would be the first to admit that her butt drove you wild, but you found it hard to maintain that infatuation in times like these where you found yourself stuck with it one way or another. And with each passing step it felt like the temperature would rise and rise, the source of which being the sweaty cavern between her buns.

The walk to her friend's house was no more than 10 minutes, but the fact that you were in a heavy, warm suit made it much feel much longer. The worst part was that you had no way of seeing the outside world in this predicament, only being able to hear slightly muffled sounds coming through the suit. But after a number of luckily accident-free minutes you began to hear the unmistakable bass beat of music, and you knew you were at the party. Quickly you reached your hand up through what little space you had and poked Mckayla in the ass cheek in an effort to get her attention.

"AH" your wife shrieked before turning around and scanning the sidewalk behind her. She had assumed some kid must have run up and touched her butt on a dare or something based on the sensation she felt, but was quickly confused when she saw nobody there. "Hello? Whoever did that you should know it's not polite to touch a lady without her permission!" Mckayla shouted out some broad message to the surrounding area, still not sure of what touched her before turning around. You could still hear her voice clearly enough despite and you facepalmed knowing that your wife had already forgotten about you before shouting up,

"Mckayla! It's Tom! I'm in the butt of your freaking costume!" Mckayla was just able to make out your muffled words over the music of the nearby house and a lightbulb turned on in her head as she recognized you.

"Oh Tom! I'm so sorry I couldn't see you! What's up?" Mckayla turned once more and looked down at her own ass, still not really able to discern your form from the back of her costume. Her utterly nonchalant tone bothered you slightly until you realized that of course she had every reason to be relaxed. From her perspective she was just wearing an awesome costume, not hovering inches away from sweaty mounds of flesh that could fit her entire head between them like you were.

"Just don't forget about me back here! It's getting really hot and I don't want to be in here too long!" You shouted back.

"Don't worry Tom I won't forget! Just long enough to show off our sweet costume for a bit then you can hop out." You breathed a sigh of relief, but almost as if she had some unconscious sixth sense to unintentionally inspire dread in you, she continued, "But the party sounds kind of loud in there so I don't think I'm going to be able to hear you! It's okay though I promise I'll let you get out whenever you want!"

Mckayla's last sentence struck fear into your heart, as any significant distraction to her usually meant a terrible fate for you, and loud music along with dancing seemed likely to be just that. Just as you were about to raise a concern you felt the huge right cheek in front of you flex its muscles, rubbing its sweaty skin slightly across your nose before the rest of her leg stepped forward. Immediately you knew you had to keep up or risk falling into her and you shut up to focus on the movement. Moments later you felt your wife's guiding legs come to a halt with you right behind them, and heard Mckayla knocking on the door.

In no more than ten seconds one of Mckayla's best friends swung the door open in a sexy nurse costume before shrieking with joy upon seeing her friend. "Welcome, girl! You look smoking hot in that costume! Come in, come in!"

Mckayla flashed a big smile at the compliment before striding elegantly into the house, accentuating her walk for show, an action which caused her cheeks to rub against your face slightly once again.

"Woah, how did you get your back legs to move in such a realistic fashion like that? It looks almost like a real person is back there!" Mckayla's friend asked curiously.

"That's because it IS a real person! It's my husband, Tom!" Mckayla responded and you let loose a breath of relief now knowing that at least one other person at this party was aware of your existence. It didn't seem like much, but with the forgetfulness of Mckayla this was actually crucial for you to know. "If you want I can take him off so you can meet him real quick!" For a brief moment you were utterly elated, your wife was actually giving you an opportunity to get out of this embarrassing situation! That was, until her friend responded,

"Are you kidding! No way! I mean sure I would love to meet your husband of course but not until we've shown off your costume to everyone!" With that response your fate was sealed and she quickly grabbed Mckayla's arm, yanking her towards the rest of the party goers. This sudden, jerky movement was not at all like the smooth movements of Mckayla's steps up until that point, and as a result you found your head quickly pressed against the back of the costume from the momentum before bouncing straight in the opposite direction and slamming your face firmly into the crack of Mckayla's ass. You felt your head squish slightly into the earthy-smelling flesh in front of you, but thankfully you were able to brace your hands against her thighs and yank yourself back off of her skin.

As you two got deeper into the party, the music got louder and louder, preventing both you and Mckayla from hearing each other at all. You began to feel very suspicious of this whole situation, combining both Mckayla's forgetfulness with her love to socialize was a recipe for disaster for you. The truth was, though, now that nobody could hear you things were completely out of your control. You could only sit back in your fabric prison and wait while staring at the enormous, now completely sweaty, prison guards right in your face.

Does Mckayla keep her promise?

1252311.content:
The party raged on with Mckayla bubbily bouncing from person to person showing off her wonderful costume. Some of the women poked fun at how "lucky" you were to spend quality time with Mckayla's fantastic ass, while others simply fawned over how good of a couple you two were. Mckayla's friends often glorified your wife's absurdly large, yet perfectly shaped rump, and for good reason. It was more than deserving of it. However, the fact remained that none of them ever had to have the up close and personal experience with it that you did. If they could experience 5 minutes of the soul-crushing pressure or the earthy sweat that those buns could produce then you firmly believed they would view it differently. Regardless, you couldn't hear any of the conversations happening in the realm of normal people as your entire world consisted of the damp ass-flesh frequently bumping into your face.

Time flew for Mckayla and dragged on incessantly for you as she continued to make sure she talked to each and everyone she knew at the party. As it turned out, by mentioning you nonstop to each new friend she talked to she actually remembered where you were for once! She turned over her shoulder and affectionately rubbed a hand on the butt of her costume, which was actually the back of your head. Pressing your face slightly into her rump in what she thought was a flirtatious way simply ended up with more unnecessary butt sweat smearing over you. Mckayla sighed with happiness as she scanned the room, noticing that she had said hello to each and every person there. The moment was bittersweet, as she now knew her 15 minutes of attention would be over, but at the same time she could now let you out so you two could enjoy the party together! She looked down at the costume, noticing that there was no zipper in the middle to allow you to get out, only one in the front which would require both of you to take the costume off. Mckayla had no problem with showing a little skin, especially around her model friends who had seen her in practically nothing countless times before. Reaching for the zipper she grabbed it and quickly yanked the clasp downward.

*SNAP*

Mckayla's eyes popped open as she held up her hand... to see the clasp of the zipper had broken right off. Her mind first went to the costume itself as she was upset about her recent purchase breaking so quickly. The reality that she didn't understand was that she had been placing far too much pressure on the suit itself with her enormous, curvy body, and something was bound to give sooner or later. A few seconds later she finally realized the real travesty of shattering her zipper. Gulping, she looked down and saw the zipper zipped tight against the front of her waist, then looking back she faintly saw the outline of your head behind her rump. Panicking, Mckayla realized she had to tell you the situation quickly, and maybe you could give some insight about what to do. In a flash she bolted towards the bathroom, causing your head to ricochet off the back of the costume and then forward, slamming you into the crack of her ass. This time it was with such force combined with the high temperatures that you felt your face squash slightly into the inside of each cheek as well as the crack itself. You would have whimpered if you could as Mckayla's steps sent her enormous butt cheeks shaking to and fro, each one slamming into the other like a steamroller. You felt your face get cmashed as it now seemed like her ass was almost intentionally eating your head up. Seconds later she reached the bathroom and shut the door behind her, muffling the sound of the blaring music. She steeled her nerves and said down to you,

"Tom? I know this isn't what you want to hear right now but the costume is kind of broken... And I can't take it off."

Your head was nearly neck deep in your wife's ass at this point but you could still barely hear her despite the circumstances. Needless to say you were furious, Mckayla promised that you wouldn't be spending long in this ass-filled hellhole but now it seemed like you would be. Out of sheer rage and willpower you slammed your hands into each cheek and shoved against her meaty cheeks as hard as you could. As to be expected, Mckayla didn't even budge an inch from the force of all your strength, but somehow you popped your now two-dimensional head free from her crack! Mckayla must have felt all of this as she let out a surprised "OH" once you came free. You then used your hands to pry your squashed face back into normalcy, suddenly restoring your ability to speak! This was perhaps the quickest recovery that you had ever made but you didn't have much time to bask in the glory. You shouted up at Mckayla,

"Mckayla! Let's go home now and just cut the suit off! I can't take it anymore do you know how god damn sweaty your ass is?" You shouted up, loud enough to hear.

"Oh no, Tom, is it really that bad? I'm so sorry I would have never put you through that if I knew!" She said caringly down to you. The reality was she definitely should have thought about how sweaty her butt gets, but of course she happened to forget at the worst possible times for you. Nevertheless you were capable of talking, Mckayla was aware of your existence, and you had a plan to get free. So things weren't looking too bad for you after all!

"Alright Tom I'll head home right now I promise." She said with another affectionate pat on your head, this time you manage to hold you head back enough to not slam into her buns. Immediately she opened the bathroom door and began walking out of the party. She ran into the host and said a quick goodbye without explaining the situation before exiting the house entirely. You kept up with her walking pace this time, her massive cheeks only grazing your nose with every step as opposed to chewing you between them. A fact you were currently very grateful for. Even the blazing sun beating down on your fabric prison couldn't damper your mood, despite the inundation of sweat it seemed to be forming on the ass of your wife in front of you. And nearly 10 minutes later you two returned home!

Mckayla opened the door and walked inside, bolting for the drawer where she kept scissors. Your torture was nearly over as you heard her open the drawer and pull them out.

"Okay Tom, time to get you..." Mckayla's sentence was abruptly interrupted by a ringing of her cellphone.

*RING RING*

She reached into her pocket and pulled it out. The fact that she even had pockets yet your half didn't even have a zipper to free yourself annoyed you greatly, but you brushed it off. After listening for a few moments she spoke up again,

"Wait, what!? You sent pictures of my costume to the head photographer... and she loved it!? And she wants to do a photoshoot for a video-game tomorrow morning with me in it!? I can't believe it that's so amazing thank you! ... Okay I'll see you then!" Mckayla hung up the phone and you couldn't believe your ears. Grinning ear to ear at the opportunity for such a fun photoshoot she then looked at the scissors in her hand and down at you before her stomach dropped once more.

"Oh no, Tom. I'm so sorry. I got caught up in the moment! I just agreed to do a shoot tomorrow first thing in the morning!" She said.

"Well just cut me out and we can go get another costume beforehand!" You responded.

"The costume store is already closed and it won't open before the shoot tomorrow..."

You were stunned. Now your wife was telling you that you would be stuck in the costume for a minimum of an entire day longer. You had a myriad of words you would have liked to say to your wife right now, but you knew how important her job was to her, and asking her to bail on a photoshoot would be like breaking her heart. Sighing then steadying yourself you spoke up,

"It's okay, Mckayla. I understand. Just wear the costume until the shoot is over then take me off after. You're gonna look so hot in the costume and that's all that matters."

Your kind words must have reached Mckayla as she quickly perked up her mood, "Oh Tom you seriously are the best husband anyone could ask for! I promise this will be over soon! And feel free to grab my butt as much as you want while you're down there if you need to. I'm sorry I don't have much more to entertain you with."

You smiled at your wife's attempt at making the situation seem better as you responded, "Will do, babe. Just please try to limit the amount of sitting while I'm back here, okay? And I swear to god if you fart..." you joked up at your wife and she giggled in response.

"Oh god that would be like the world's worst hotbox now wouldn't it?" Mckayla joked but was actually right on the money with her description. You had involuntarily taken place in one of these horrific hotboxes before and zero part of you wanted to do it again. "I promise I won't! I mean... well I shouldn't need to!" she finished.

The fact that she didn't guarantee you this with certainty terrified you greatly, but you didn't have much other choice. Taking a breath in you readied yourself for the upcoming long night and day ahead...

1253.content:
“I can help you clean up too!” Mckayla beamed, a radiant smile spreading across her face. Immediately, your conscience screamed at you to tell her no. Things were only going to go terribly wrong for you if she pitched in. However, her face was so alluring, and her cheerful smile was so infectious. After a moment of hesitation, you nodded.

“Sure thing honey.” You said softly, already regretting uttering those words.

“Yay!” Mckayla exclaimed, as excited as a little school girl. She bent down and gave you a big kiss, her plush lips leaving a mark on your forehead, and a few drops of saliva ran down your nose. While you took a second to wipe your face, Mckayla put her headphones back in, and strolled to the corner of the room. You whirled to face her, feeling a tinge of fear.

“Mckayla darling. Are the headphones necessary?” You inquired, but your question fell on deaf ears. Mckayla’s music was blaringly loud, and there was no way she was ever going to hear you with them in. With a deep sigh, you began collecting discarded articles of clothing, and trying your hardest to stay as far away from your giantess wife as you could.

The job proceeded relatively smoothly, despite your fears, but the peace did not last. You came to a sock that had been so sweaty and crusty that it was stuck to the floor. You dropped to your hands and knees, and gripped the fabric of the sock as tightly as your tiny arms could manage. Your squishy status made you weaker than a normal human being to being with, and your minute size certainly didn’t help either.

Finally, you were beginning to make a bit of progress, and the disgusting sock slowly peeled away from the floor bit by bit. A triumphant smile spread across your face, but then a suspicious shadow washed over you and the sock. Glancing up in fear, you saw the towering form of Mckayla, standing right beside you. She had worked her way around the room and back to you, and you had been too distracted to notice.

“Mckay…” Was all you got out before Mckayla, oblivious to your presence, took another step back. Her foot slammed down onto your face, squashing it flat. Your unknowingly wife didn’t notice, though she did step off of you a moment later. Taking advantage of this time, you crawled away as fast as you could, which wasn’t easy with half a smushed body.

You crawled up onto the damp yoga mat from earlier, deciding it was a safe enough distance away from Mckayla. As you were beginning to reform again, you took note of your wife, who was grabbing a few things from a shelf. You couldn’t quite see what they were, but they almost looked like…

“Might as well clean all of these.” Mckayla said aloud, interrupting your thoughts. You realized she was holding a stack of three extra yoga mats, but you didn’t react fast enough. Your wife tossed the yoga mats towards you, clearly intending to stack them on top of the mat you were currently resting on. You screamed, but Mckayla was still blasting music, and she also wasn’t turned to watch the tragedy she was about to commit.

The heavy stack of yoga mats landed perfectly on the yoga mat already in place, and you didn’t stand a chance. You were crushed as flat as paper under their weight, your squishy body reduced to nothing in less than a second. Everything became dark, and the pressure was more than enough to keep you in place. You couldn’t move, reform, talk, or escape until the mats on top of you were moved.

It took Mckayla another thirty minutes to finish cleaning her exercise room, and by the time she finished, she had forgotten that she had even been working with you in the first place. She grabbed the yoga mats and the dirty clothes, carried them downstairs, and tossed them into the washing machine. You hoped she would see you before doing this, but you once more avoided her detection.

The wash cycle was brutal, and it still caused you endless pain and torment no matter how many times you were forced to endure it. The freezing water chilled you to the core, the constant spinning caused you to pass out after only ten minutes, and other articles of clothing constantly smacked into your body, which now resembled a tiny man logo on the yoga mat.

The dryer was no more merciful than the washer had been, and in fact, it was even worse. The high temperature partially melted your squishy body, and your liquid state was eagerly absorbed by the fabric of the yoga mat. By the time the dryer had finished, you were had been mostly absorbed into the yoga mat, which meant the only way you were getting free would be by outside help, or an extended period of time without anything crushing you, which seemed unlikely.

The dryer was opened, and your beautiful wife was there to greet you. She took every item out in turn, eventually coming to you. Her gaze rested on you for a moment, and a confused look appeared on her face. You tried wiggling and squirming, but could do nothing but stay still like a normal logo would. Mckayla rubbed her hand across the mat, yet felt only fabric as you had been absorbed into the mat. Your clothes had also torn off during the wash, making you appear naked, and blend in slightly. All of the signs were against you, but you still had hope.

Mckayla eventually opens her mouth to speak, but what does she say?
