12532.content:
"Thomas? My goodness! Is that you? What happened?" Mckayla exclaimed, running her fingers over your body. She couldn't feel your body at all, you're lucky she saw you because feeling you while using the mat was out of the question at this point. Obviously, the wash and dry cycle had taken its toll on your body and you could do nothing to communicate back to your wife. She stared at you awaiting your response, you could only look back, dumbfounded that your wife would assume you were capable of talking to her in this state. After a minute it seemed to finally click that you couldn't speak and Mckayla began to think about what must have happened. You could see the ditzy gears turning in her head and after another minute she realized what she had done. "Oh god! I totally forgot we were cleaning the exercise room together earlier! Crap I must have squished you to the mat somehow. I'm sorry sweetie, I really should be more careful" she finally said. The intent was nice of her but you knew there was no way you could change her nature, or your body's nature for that matter. Her obliviousness and your squishiness were almost always a recipe for disaster, but you couldn't blame her. After all, you've pretty much gotten used to it after nearly 20 years of marriage. Your train of thought was interrupted by a ring on the doorbell. *Ding dong*

Mckayla looked down at the mat in her hands and her eyes went wide. "Thomas, please tell me you can get yourself off of there somehow" she pleaded. You knew you were squished much too well for that, but you gave an effort anyway. You struggled and wriggled with as much force as you could possibly exert, and finally... nothing. Your body couldn't budge at all. Without Mckayla's help you don't think you would ever be capable of escaping your fused prison. Your beautiful wife stared down at you, praying to see some level of movement or a corner of you body peeling off, but after a few more seconds she didn't see a single thing. Just then the doorbell rang again *ding dong* and you saw obvious worry in her eyes. Mckayla was being awfully quiet, but as your eyes met she spoke up.

"Tom, I know this is the last thing you want to hear right now, but I invited three friends over for a little yoga sesh, that's why I was washing all the mats... and that's them at the door right now. We all need a mat each or else the carpet might burn our elbows and knees during certain poses!" You couldn't believe your wife was more worried about some minor rug burn than your tiny body being completely crushed by her or one of her giantess friends. Sometimes you wish you explained to your wife better that being squished was not a pleasant experience, but you doubt she would remember anyway. Mckayla then continued, "And I only have 4 mats total so one of us literally has to use you. I wish there was another way babe but I can't think of anything." You desperately wanted to be able to shout out "JUST DON'T USE ME" but sadly you couldn't. Also once your wife's mind was on one train of thought there wasn't much possibility of her considering other options. Your wife, with her hands tied in her mind and only one option to take, said "So I'll have to use you... err this mat I guess, I don't know what to refer to you as right now hehe. Uhhh whatever I'll have to use you two for this workout and then I promise right after I'll work on freeing you. Okay?"

You had to admit you were a bit weirded out by your wife referring to you and a yoga mat as "you two" as if you were equal in her eyes. Her husband of nearly twenty years and a worn out old yoga mat should definitely not be in the same category, but you rationalized that in this state you kind of were. Just then Mckayla flopped the stack of three mats back on top of you, casting you into darkness, and you sighed. This definitely was not going to go well for you.

From Mckayla's perspective she was upset about being forced to use her husband like this, but in her mind there was no other option. So she tried not to beat herself up too much about the situation and set out to try and enjoy her workout. She strolled to the front door, holding the stack of mats for her and her friends, and opened the door. There stood three of her friends, almost as drop dead gorgeous as herself, clad in tight exercise outfits just the same as Mckayla's. A chorus of "heeeyyys" and other greetings rang out as Mckayla greeted her friends. They stood and chatted for a minute, you being crushed further in darkness under the other yoga mats. Eventually the ladies all walked to the recently cleaned exercise room and got ready for their workout. Mckayla handed each one a mat until she was only holding the one you were fused to. She looked directly at you and grimaced, realizing that she had squished you already, and mouthed "sorry" to you as she laid you down on the ground.

"So what routine are we doin today, girl?" One of Mckayla's friends asked her. Your wife wracked her mind trying to come up with a routine that would squish you as little as possible. She responded, "I think lots of planks and standing exercises today ladies, lets work our cores!" You were thankful and proud of your wife for at least picking out a workout that wasn't too hard on you. And before you knew it your wife's enormous body cast an equally large shadow over your diminutive, crushed form. She slammed her forearms down far above you and balanced her weight on her toes on the other side. You were stuck smack dab in the middle of the mat, staring at your wife's exposed stomach between her sports bra and skin tight leggings. Your wife was getting a workout and you weren't getting crushed at all! This was actually the best case scenario for this situation, and you were very thankful for your wife's quick thinking (for once). Above you, your wife was evidently struggling with her workout. You couldn't see much past her sizable bust but if you could you would see her face struggling to keep up with the exercise. While she was in fantastic cardio state, her abs were relatively lagging. You watched your wife's body begin to quiver, as well as commence her trademark profuse sweating. After a few rounds of planks your wife was already soaked through with sweat. Beads of sweat ran down her stomach and dripped off the exposed skin, directly onto your body below. You were thoroughly soaked after only a few minutes and your wife hadn't even touched you yet. At that moment one of her friends shouted out, "Whew this ab workout is great! Lets move onto another ab exercise, like... sit-ups!" Both you and your wife simultaneously gulped. This wasn't the plan.

"Uhh im not so sure we should do that" your wife responded, half because she knew sit-ups meant demolishing your body under her ass, and half for her own sake. She was exhausted and coated in sweat already. You both prayed that her other friends would agree with your wife and not move onto that workout...

"Oh come on Mckayla, I know abs aren't your thing but sit-ups would be the perfect exercise to make them stronger! Let's do it ladies." Mckayla groaned, she was already struggling as is. She was soaked with sweat and her abs were exhausted, working out those muscles any more sounded terrible. She was about to flip over and struggle through them, when she remembered you. She moved her body until her eyes met yours, her beautiful face looming over you. Even in her sweaty, tired state she still looked like a goddess to you. She mouthed the words, "I'm really sorry about this" and grimaced at you. She then turned her body over and went to sit down. For a brief moment her ass hung above your body, as you prepared yourself for what was to come. The slapping of her huge cheeks onto the surface produced a loud clap, and the sweat-soaked fabric of her leggings squelched as some of their stored sweat poured out onto the surface, and you, below. Mckayla's face flushed with embarrassment, she didn't realize how big of an impact simply sitting down would have. She winced when she realized all of that had just slammed right on top of you, but even more so she was terribly embarrassed about doing that in front of her friends. Everyone froze for a second, until all 3 other ladies burst out in a round of laughter. In between fits of giggles one of her friends poked fun and said,

"Damn girl you gotta be careful where you park that big thing! That could crush someone if you aren't careful." Her friend laughed even more at her own joke, until her other friend added, "And jeez just how sweaty does your ass get Mckayla? I could literally hear the sweat coming out of there." Mckayla was incredibly embarrassed, but after a second she was able to laugh it off along with them. She added herself, "Yeah trust me this thing can do some serious damage" and laughed along with her friends. After they were done messing around they began the actual exercise. As Mckayla struggled with sit-up after sit-up the pressure would increase and decrease on top of you throughout the reps. It was complete torture for you, and your wife seemed to be laughing about it with her friends. Her sweaty cheeks had you trapped in utter darkness, but for some reason your sense of smell was still active even in your flattened state. So you were forced to take in the earthy scent emanating from her ass crack as she continued her exercise. You could do nothing more but wait until this was over.

After nearly a half an hour more exercise and stretching, all of which seemed to require Mckayla's butt plopped right on top of you, it seemed like the ladies were finally finishing up. Finally, her ass peeled off of you and you were exposed to the light again. You were lying in a pool of sweat but you were grateful for the respite from tons of crushing force on your body. As your eyes adjusted your wife and her friends chatted some more, and one said,

"Hey wait Mckayla, where's your little husband at? I haven't seen him since we got here. We didn't squish him as we walked in or anything right?" All of the girls began scanning the ground and their feet for you, until one girl's eyes fell on the little man shaped logo on Mckayla's mat. She stared for a second, then her eyes lit up and she exploded into a fit of laughter. "Hahahaha oh my god Mckayla, is that Tom stuck to your mat right there?!" she pointed at your form as all ladies turned to look at you. Just as your eyes became accustomed to the light you saw the faces of four beautiful women, your wife included, staring down at your destroyed body. Once again all of the ladies broke out into laughter, your wife joining them so she wouldn't look suspicious. To cover her own ass, something that you were used to doing physically, Mckayla lied and said

"Ooh whoops sweetie, I didn't see you down there. You know you gotta be more careful around me when I workout!" This just made her friends laugh even more until one shouted out, "All that talk about how your ass could crush someone was more than just a joke, girl! Your little husband was taking the brunt of that booty-beatdown the entire time we were working out. Oh man I'm surprised he's even alive down there." The girls seemed to find your predicament absolutely hilarious, and even though you could tell your wife was genuinely worried about you, she had to go along with her friends so they wouldn't make fun of her anymore. Sadly this was an issue with your wife on occasion. You knew she never wanted to squish you but she could be terrible at giving into peer pressure when she was hanging out with some of her friends. You hoped now that her friends would leave so she could drop the act and work on freeing you. With luck, one of them said,

"Okay I think we have to go now. That was a great workout ladies, let's do it again soon. And Mckayla, good luck with your little sticker-husband, see you later!" You shake your whole body the same as you did last night in response. You were getting a little dizzy from her turning you over and over in her hands to investigate you. "Wow. McKayla had told me you could stay squished into things for a while, but she never said it could last through a whole night with nothing keeping you from reforming. Let alone all night plus however long you'd been stuck before the run. I should ask her what to do, maybe you need help..." she says, utterly astonished. You strongly shake yourself in response while tumbling between her hands, wanting her to get your wife's help immediately. You'd been crushed far longer than a few hours before, but McKayla probably forgot all about it like she does everything else. Either way, she was your best hope of escape from the socks since you'd been unable to reform even a tiny amount on your own.

Nadia dropped you on the bed then scrambled around looking for her phone. You started planning how you'd thank your wife once you were yourself again, but Nadia froze before slowly turning to look at you again. Hesitantly, she picks you up and asks, "Wait, what if... Tom? Are you still socks because... you LIKE being socks?" You frantically try to shake your head negative, but there's not really a way for her to tell if the shake was for yes or no. And unfortunately for you, confirmation bias was slowly settling in her mind. "I mean, you've been stuck waaay longer than she ever mentioned. She said you always reformed yourself as soon as possible with her. Even after things like this where you agreed to be squished. But now you've been had all night on my pillow to..." her eyes went wide in surprise at what she was thinking. 'Tom, is it just that you don't want to be HER socks? Yeah, she always tries to protect you, but she's almost always the one that ends up flattening you. I mean, how many times have you been rescued by ME because she had forgotten you ..." You shake, in agreement this time having missed the words she emphasized, as she keeps mindlessly turning you and passing your halves between her hands. You couldn't really deny it after all. Your wife was a forgetful klutz, but you loved her anyways.

You find yourself looking at her her face, now filled with a somehow intimidatingly hopeful expression. "You know I've never liked your, well, condition. Worrying about a squishy guy is just not my thing, and the few times I've crushed you, you always reform quickly. Especially when I complain you might ruin my socks when I step on you. And everyone knows how much I love my socks. This time though..." an excited smile starts to form on her face "This time, you're not a squishy guy flattened on my sock. You ARE socks. And you stayed as them with me, even after almost a full day... Tom?..." Your heart sinks as she asks you, "Does this mean you DON'T want to go back to McKayla? Do you want to stay as MY socks?" You shake as hard as you can at the prospect. Her feet were probably worse than McKayla's! She rolled her eyes and giggled though, "I don't mean forever, obviously. You can change back anytime you want to, just like usual. But until then you'd be my favorite pair of lucky socks. I'd wear you all the time, and promise I wouldn't wash you until absolutely necessary" She laughs again as you keep shaking, "Afterall, I wouldn't want to wash out all that luck you've already got in you. I wouldn't want to hurt Kay, but there's no way she hasn't forgot about you. You'd be able to stay with my feet as long as you wanted."

She took half of you in each hand and looked hopefully between each. "Okay Tom, same as last night. Shake left or right. Left means I've got this all wrong. I'll leave you on the pillow while I go to work so you can reform, and then I 'lltake you back home. But right," she bites her lip in excitement, "shake right and I'll know you want THIS to be your home. I promise I'd wear you all the time, only taking you off if I absolutely have to. If McKayla asks, I'll just say you must have reformed while I was asleep and left. I even have an identical, squashed face free pair of socks I can show her if I need to." The room was still spinning from the way she'd been handling you since waking up, and it was impossible to focus on anything. Her expression though went serious as she said, "But Tom, if you shake right, I mean it. I won't think of you as Tom anymore. Your new name will just be Lucky. Lucky the lucky socks. I still can't believe you might want this, but I'll give you the full experience if you do. Maybe this full body shaking Is just you begging to rub my tootsies. Well if you choose me, I'll be sure you to put you on right away anytime you shake. You deserve it for being such lucky socks. So which is it Tom, left to be human, or right to be socks?"

You try to focus through the vertigo she unwittingly gave you, but you're still wishing you had a stomach so you could just throw up. For reasons besides sweaty feet this time. "Come on Tom, or Lucky. I told you last night, if you don't respond, I'll assume you want it." You know from her voice she means it, so you roll the dice and guess...

“This isn’t my yoga mat.” Mckayla frowned, continuing to rub her fingers across the silly logo engrained into the mat. Your body squished against Mckayla’s stomach as she pinned the yoga mat to her side, having no clue in the world that her loving husband was so close to her, and yet so far. You tried to wiggle, move, or scream, but you were physically unable to do anything but silently accept your fate, and pray for some sort of miracle to save you.

Mckayla plopped down onto the couch, resting the yoga mat that contained you beside her. For the next few hours, she did nothing but watch TV, not even sparing you a second glance. You stared at your wife hopelessly, feeling a pang of sadness every time she laughed happily at a joke on the television. She was merrily enjoying her life, all while you suffered.

Finally, Vicky returned home from school. She entered the house, waved hello to Mckayla, and started to head upstairs. Mckayla realized it was time to stop watching TV, so she placed her hands on the couch and pushed herself onto her feet. As she did do, her hand pressed down onto your face, and she gasped loudly.

“OH! I almost forgot!” Mckayla grabbed the yoga mat and rushed after Vicky. “Hey Vicky! I have something for you!”

“Yeah?” Vicky asked, walking back down the stairs. Mckayla dumped the yoga mat into Vicky’s arm. Vicky spotted your crushed, pathetic form instantly, and her jaw opened in complete bafflement. Her eyes widened, and she looked at Mckayla in confusion.

“This is your yoga mat, right? I washed it for you, so it should be good as new!” Mckayla beamed, proud of her hard work. Vicky hesitated, glancing back and forth between her flattened father and her innocently smiling mother.

“Yoga…mat.” Vicky stammered. “This is…just a yoga mat?”

“Of course, silly. What else does it look like?” Mckayla giggled. “Though, I do love the cute little logo. It’s like a tiny little man!”

“Logo…logo…uh…tiny man…”

“Is it not your yoga mat?” Mckayla paused. Vicky quickly nodded her head up and down.

“Uh no. It’s mine. My yoga mat. Definitely mine. I’m sorry. School was a bit rough today.” Vicky smiled, returning her mother’s enthusiasm.

“Okay then!”

“And yes, this little logo is adorable, isn’t it?” Vicky teased, stroking you with one finger. “I had this yoga mat specially ordered online. They engrained this funny logo right into the fabric of the mat. One hundred percent just a simple design, but it adds so much, doesn’t it?” Vicky explained, while Mckayla nodded.

“Maybe order one for me sometime?” She asked, before sauntering off. Vicky walked back up to her bedroom a moment later, closing the door behind her. After taking a deep breath, she looked down at you, a wide, Cheshire grin on her face. You knew what that grin meant. You had seen it before, and it spelled trouble.

“Wow dad, I don’t know how this happened, but I think it’s the first time you’ve ever been delivered to me on a silver platter, so to speak.” Vicky laughed cruelly. “I was having a pretty shitty day up until now. I flunked the calculus test. But lo and behold, I get home, and my whole day turns around! You won’t be able to punish me for screwing up the test, and I get one of the best chances to torment you that I’ve ever had!”

Vicky dropped the yoga mat onto the floor of her room, and stood towering above you. You mentally quivered in a mix of fear and anger, staring up at your giantess daughter. In this predicament, she was like a goddess to you, and your fate rested entirely in her sadistic hands.

“I mean, mom even gave me to you herself! She thinks that you belong to me, like you’re nothing more than a possession. And, thanks to my own quick thinking, she’s utterly and absolutely convinced that you’re just a silly little design on my personal yoga mat. She’ll never doubt my actions, or my words.” Vicky leaned down and grinned widely, a sight that would haunt your dreams for years to come. “She’s not going to save you. Ever. Only I can save you…and I won’t.”

Vicky chuckled to herself and walked to the other side of the room, taking care to purposefully plant a foot on your body as she walked over you. Her feet did not smell good, but thankfully the heavy weight only pressed down on you for a mere moment. After that, you couldn’t see Vicky anymore. You could only hear the sound of her laughter, and the sound of rustling clothes. You also heard the faint sound of Vicky talking on the phone with someone.

A few minutes later, Vicky strolled back into view, standing above you with a confident smirk on her face. She had changed into workout clothes, which consisted of a sports bra and pink booty shorts. Vicky took her place on the spare yoga mat, shot you a devilish grin, and gave Lily the thumbs up signal. Their exercise session, and your hell, was about to begin.

Your name is Ben Peterson. For as long as you could remember, you've been on the very bottom of the totem pole. Not a day goes by without you having to be scraped off the bottom of someone's shoe, or drag yourself out of the toilet after going through someone's digestive system. You've been through so many perils that your body has suffered a great deal of damage, with you currently standing at less than half of your original height. Most of this has to do with how your dad, Max, has raised you. He isn't a bad father by any means. He makes sure your fed, clothed, and taken care of. The problem lies with how he deals with your condition. Rather than being extra careful and protective, your dad's always encouraged you to toughen up and tackle your problems head on, rather than relying on the kindness of others. This has never worked in your favor. Once when you were a kid, you overheard a girl making fun of you. Rather than brushing it off, you confronted her about it and wound up becoming her lunch for the day.

You've never known your biological mother. She and your father divorced not long after you were born and he took custody of you. You've had several maternal figures in your life, though, in the form of your dad's many girlfriends. He finally settled down a few years ago, though, marrying your step-mother, Catherine. While she found your condition odd at first, she quickly warmed up to you... though, you have had quite a few "accidents" around her.

One person you certainly haven't warmed up to was your annoying step-brother, Chris. It's not that he was a bad kid. He just never took any of your perils seriously, seeing you as some living cartoon character. You were often unwilling fodder for his stupid online video project, "Bendy Benny", which consisted of him forcing you into some humiliating predicament and filming it like it were a cartoon show.

The only time you felt truly safe was when you were with your girlfriend, Talia. She's been your best friend ever since childhood, and you started dating recently. You met in junior high when you were paired together for a science project. The two of you quickly bonded and have been inseparable ever since. That's not to say that no one's tried to come between you. You've encountered rivals for Talia's affection multiple times and had to endure a lot to get where you were, but you love her too much to let her go.

Today, your parents are heading out on vacation, leaving you and Chris by yourselves. Chris is able to take care of himself, so all you need to do is avoid him for the next couple of weeks as you're left unattended.

What will happen today?

That wasn’t to say you weren’t scared, as accidents always seemed to happen with you, but you were still going to make the trip anyway. Talia was worth it.

No one answered. You knocked again, but still no one answered. A tiny tinge of fear grew within you, but you shoved it back down. Talia had clearly overslept, something that she tended to do often. She had a few forgetful tendencies, and one has a habit of forgetting to set her alarm each night. As such, you had no easy way of getting into the house, but there were always other ways of achieving your goals.

You trekked around to the back of the house, and strolled up to the back door. Talia used to own a small pug, and so there was a doggy door installed into their back door. She gave the dog to her best friend after you had a traumatizing accident with it, so it wasn’t a problem. She insisted on keeping the doggy door for your convenience though, hence why you had come back here.

After crawling through the doggy door, you found yourself in the kitchen. Faint music was drifting from somewhere nearby by, and investigating the noise led you to the living room. Talia’s mother was in the room, working up to some kind of exercise program on the TV.

Talia’s mother, Teresa, was an incredibly curvaceous woman, with a beautiful body. Her tight sports bra and leggings strained to contain her curves, and you found it hard to look away. It took you almost ten minutes to scale the flight of stairs up to the second floor, and you were a bit out of breath when you reached the landing. At the same time, Talia’s bedroom was only a few more feet away, and the door was slightly ajar, so getting inside wouldn’t be hard.

The real challenge would be trying to wake your girlfriend up. Talia was a notoriously heavy sleeper, and so it would take a great deal of effort to wake her. Most likely, you would have to climb her bed and scream in her ear or something to wake her up. 132.content:
“You guys realize that it's illegal to leave Chris unattended at home right?” You say, crossing your arms up at both Catherine and your father.. They gave a small chuckle as if you were wearing a clown suit.

“We know that! We can't take either of you with us because we just want some us time on vacation. You’re 18, we can leave him with you.” Catherine said, reassuring you by setting two fingers on your shoulder, squishing it a bit. She quickly removed her fingers, and it reformed in a minute.

“Yeah, leave the normal 10 year old with an 18 year old that's a foot tall and gets squashed, worn, eaten, or sat on a daily basis. It's the same thing as abandonment.” You shot back.

“If you will make you feel better, i'll call Talia’s mom and tell her to come check on you guys every once in awhile. Your dad said, picking up the home phone.

While he was doing that, Catherine went up stairs to continue packing, you decided it be best to go back into your room and play video games. Each stair was a pain, but you finally managed to reach the top, about 15 minutes later. The door to your dad and Catherine’s room was propped open, and you could see Catherine packing her jeans and shirts into a rather large suitcase. Shaking your head, you push open the door to your room, and climbed onto your bed. There were some advantages to being a foot tall though, as your T.V. was like a cinema screen. Pushing down onto the button to the remote, it came to life. Digging around for the controller to the console, you couldn't seem to find it. Your dad had to custom order you a smaller version of it for you, so it was always a bit difficult to find in the mass of blankets.

Instead of your controller, a note was in its place. Catherine had taken your remote, probably in one of her drawers in her room. She wanted you to “Spend some time with Chris, so no video games while we are gone.” according to the note. This was no problem, since you could just steal the controller back when they left. Turning your tv off, you climbed back down off the bed, and opened the door to check if they left yet. Not seeing the light on and the door shut, you darted over to their room, and cracked the door. Nobody was in there.

You heard commotion in the living room, so you snuck over to the stairs, and looked down. Your father and Catherine were walking out the door with suitcases. Giving them a wave goodbye, you darted into the empty room, and began to scale the large dresser. Beside the dresser was an open suit case, so they apparently weren't completely finished yet. You needed to be quick. Reaching the top, a drawer open about an inch, containing various pairs of panties and bras sitting right below you. Inside one of the bra cups, you spotted your tiny controller. Climbing through the gap, you stepped onto the cup, causing it to tip, sending your controller somewhere in the tangled mess of panties and what not.

The door downstairs had opened and shut again, they were coming back! Knowing you would be grounded for life if Catherine found you snooping around in her underwear drawer, you made a mad dash for the opening of the drawer. The thump of someone's feet were getting closer as they climbed the steps.

“Ben, i'm sure you're mad at me for the controller thing, but it's for your own good okay?” Catherine’s voice rang out.

You grabbed ahold of the top of the drawer, hauling yourself up and over the drawers face. In your panicked rush to get out of sight and hide from catherine, you had forgotten how gravity and a hard surface affected your squishy body. With a silent splat, You had landed on something tan and soft. Whatever it was, you blended right in. Looking around, it seemed to be a hollowed rectangle with rounded edges, and a zipper around the top portion. It was the suitcase! Hopefully Catherine wouldn't be able to see you in the… open suitcase…. bollocks.

Catherines looming figure appeared through the door, and she hastily began to pack the rest of her clothing. Clothes began to fill part of the suitcase, until something tan coloured blocked out the light, and you could feel your body peel off the suitcase onto whatever had hit you.

“Dammit, i needed that.” Catherine said, lifting it and you out of the suitcase.

What exactly were you stuck to?
132.title: Catherine forgot something at the house.

choices: Under the RUMP
Handbag Smuggler
Another Family for Protection
1321.content:
You looked into the mirror and saw what exactly you were stuck to. You were stuck to a breakfast bar that your mother had. Thankfully enough, it was encased in a wrapper so you knew you wouldn't be eaten any time soon, but since your mother was taking the breakfast bar on vacation, it stands to reason you wouldn't be getting home any time soon. You felt both you and the breakfast bar get stuffed into your mother's pockets.

Thankfully, it seems you are slowly starting to reform, although the speed was certainly something to be desired. You knew you couldn't yell at your mother, lest she finds out you were snooping around in her room, so you decided to stay quiet and wait until you reform, although that could potentially take so long you reform inside the plane to London. Although that wouldn't be that bad, considering staying home with your step-brother alone would ensure being tortured for his dumb video project.

You had made up your mind at that point. You would stay with your mother throughout the trip but stay hidden at the same time, ensuring that nothing could go wrong. At one point you could probably call Talia and let her know what was happening so she doesn't worry about you. Another benefit to this plan other than staying away from the demon child is that your step-mom was smoking hot. More than once had you intentionally stayed quiet as she sat on you or walked into the washroom while you were taking a shower for the chance to feel her curves and see her take a shower respectively. Your size situation certainly helped with that problem as well.

You slowly but surely reform, going through your moms trip to the airport by taxi, luggage checking, and patdowns. Thankfully, you were basically unseeable on the breakfast bar, so the guard let her through. You finally deformed when your mother sat down with your father in the flight area preparing for the trip. Of course, you immediately tried to hide somewhere and chose to hide...

A: Under your mother, sneak under her rump as she scooches back. (Not gonna be found, but you're gonna be stuck most of the flight unless she uses the washroom.
B: In her handbag, which leads to the potential of being found but lets you leave when on the airplane easily.
C: With another family in the same flight area, you can find your family when on the flight, right?
1321.title: Going up!

choices: Wiggle as hard as you could, get her to go to the bathroom and check her ass
Resign to your fate and spare yourself the punishment of her finding you
1323.content:
Catherine grabbed the small piece of cloth that your body had squished into, holding it up in the air. She then said, "Thank god I found these, my current panties are way too uncomfortable to wear for this entire plane ride" and began walking to the bathroom. She shouted to Max, "Hey I'm going to change real quick then I'll be downstairs and we can leave! Hopefully we aren't too late!" In an evident rush Catherine stripped her leggings and underwear off, grabbing you off of the counter, your squished body blending into the already tan material. Before you knew it she slipped her feet in the leg holes and you were rapidly ascending towards her ass. Almost immediately you felt that these panties were a bit too snug for her sizable rear end and your body, along with the backside of her panties, disappeared between her cheeks. Your step-mother then slid her leggings up her legs, adding another layer of pressure onto your already squished body, as well as casting it into darkness. From deep in her ass you heard her yell, "Coming now honey!" as she began to move. Catherine quickly grabbed her remaining luggage and ran downstairs, grinding you up in her crack as she moved. Soon enough you felt her slam her ass down into what had to be the passenger seat of the car, and they were on their way.

The situation had gotten out of hand fast. In only a few moments you had gone from 1 foot tall boy to a pair of panties for your 28 year old step-mom. Even worse, she had no idea that you were even underneath her. Your mind was racing a million miles a second, trying to figure out exactly what to do. Your little body was only squished onto the panties, you haven't been absorbed into them luckily, so you retained some ability to wiggle. Even though any significant movement would be severely buffered by Catherine's large cheeks, you could most likely get her attention if you tried hard enough. The real dilemma was not knowing what would happen if you did get her attention. Evidently, your parents were running late to their flight as is, so you doubted that your step-mom would even have an opportunity to take you off if she did discover your location. Moreover, Catherine would be livid that your 10 year old brother was home alone without supervision, and it was all caused by the fact that you couldn't wait 10 minutes to play your video games. It was a tough decision to say the least, and the constant pressure of your mother's jiggly butt chewing you up was not helping you think. Before you could make a decision on what to do you felt the car stop and she got out of the car.

At this point both of your parents were hustling to make it to the plane on time. Luckily for them the security checkpoint wasn't very long and they soon approached the plane. They got to the gate only minutes before it was going to close and hustled onto the plane. Meanwhile you were absolutely discombobulated in Catherine's ass. The pounding steps of her running to catch their flight were absolutely demolishing you, squishing you further and further into her panties. Finally she plopped her rear down onto what you assumed was her seat on the plane and breathed a sigh of relief.

"Whew, we made it! Now we can sit back, enjoy this 10 hour flight, and we'll be in England before you know it!" Catherine said happily to your father. From deep down in your ass prison it was hard to make out exactly what she was saying but one thing was clear, she definitely said the flight would be 10 hours long. You would be trapped in this dark, dank crevasse for nearly half a day, enduring whatever sweat or possible farting your step-mom produced throughout the flight. You began to freak out, and at this moment decided to...
1323.title: Her panties

choices: You scream Talia's name, causing her to turn around and see you.
You scream Talia's name, but she doesn't hear you.
Other Options.
133.content:
You had almost completely forgotten that you had school today, so you gathered up your small amount of belongings and headed out the door. All you carried was a tiny little Ziploc bag, which held a pencil, eraser, and a pen. It pretty much served as your makeshift backpack, though it was still a pretty heavy load to carry around. You made it work though.

The bus stop wasn’t very far away, only two blocks. You trekked through the grass beside the sidewalk, wanting to avoid as many people as you possibly could. It made your journey a little more difficult, but it was better than being crushed flat under someone’s shoe, that was for sure.

Soon, the bus stop was within your sight. A small group of students were already there, waiting patiently for the bus to arrive. Most of them were on their phones, which just reminded you how sad you were that you were too small to have a phone of your own. You approached the group of students and stood beside them, a few feet away just to give yourself a bit of space.

To your surprise, you didn’t see Talia anywhere, so you assumed she was probably taking a sick day at home. This scared you a little, as Talia was your guardian angel, but you had made it through school days without her before. Your thoughts wandered to Talia, and a goofy smile spread on your face as you pictured her cute smile.

You were ripped back to reality by a deafening “stomping sound”, and the whole ground seemed to shake. You turned around to find your small bag of supplies trapped under a thick black boot. Glancing up, it appeared the some goth girl had arrived at the bus stop, and hadn’t noticed either you or your tiny pack down on the ground.

The bus pulled up to the stop, and the students began piling in. The goth girl stepped off of your pack, and you dodged her boot as it came back down. Your eraser was smushed, and the pencil and pen were snapped in two. Groaning, you abandoned the bag and raced to the curb, leaping and landing on the first step of the bus.

Dodging a few more stomping feet, you made it to the first seat of the bus, which was almost always available. You scaled the metal leg as you had done hundreds of times before, and flipped up onto the vacant seat. You took a moment to breathe a sigh of relaxation, catching your breath. The bus began to close its doors.

“WAIT FOR ME!!!” A distinctly feminine voice cried out, and you instantly recognized it as your living girlfriend, Talia. Talia dashed down the sidewalk and up the steps onto the bus. She looked frantically for a spot to sit, and her eyes rested on the front seat. However, her eyes rested on the front seat, and not on its tiny occupant.

Talia took her backpack off and tossed it onto the seat, where it landed beside you and took up the half closest to the window. She then turned around and began to sit on the seat. As her huge, leggings clad ass began to descend onto you, you were paralyzed with fear. Glancing to your left, you saw the empty aisle of the bus. To your right was Talia’s backpack, which was slightly open. You could also fall down in front of you, onto the ground. All you knew was that you had to make a decision, and fast.
133.title: The School Bus

choices: Drops you off, leaving you to face the squishy walkway.
Runs you to class and drops you on a chair
1331.content:
"TALIAWAITDONTSITDOWN" you manage to gasp out as her meteor-like ass looks ominously overhead. You held your hands up meekly, knowing full well that your minimal strength would be tremendously overpowered by the simple act of Talia sitting down. Just as you felt the soft fabric of her leggings and the soft, squishy flesh of her buns hit your hands her descent stopped dead in its tracks. After a brief pause she quickly stood up to her full height and glanced around, looking for who was talking to her. After a moment she glanced down at her seat, seeing you waving frantically up at her. She flashed a radiant smile.

"Oh god Ben you were almost a sticker on my leggings for the day...again." Talia said cutely down to you with a giggle. She then grabbed your body in one hand, and plopped her ass down on the seat you previously were sitting in. The audible smack her derrière made onto the bus seat concerned you a bit with its force but at least this time you weren't underneath it. Talia held you up to her face and said,

"You excited for schooo today?! It's still hard to believe how much they've changed for tiny, squishy people like ya! It's pretty awesome!" You responded with a half-hearted smile and a nod, both happy to be with your loving but air headed girlfriend, and also nervous about living another day around (relative to you) giants.

Talia was referring to the changes made to your highschool on behalf of the influx of squishy people such as yourself. Although you were born squishy and have survived up until this point in a world pretty tough on someone of your size and durability, there has been a recent trend of more and more squishy humans. Some claim it to be from a type of flu, others say it's a genetic predisposition that is just randomly flaring up. Regardless, your school saw it fit to make some slight adjustments to the layout of the school and rules to try to make itself stand out as accommodating for the more durability-challenged folks.

Special walkways were outlined on the ground for squishies, certain seats in the cafeteria, in classrooms, and at sporting events were reserved for squishies, and much more. On paper this sounds like a great way to limit the inevitable squishing that you and others like you would suffer at the hands (and other body parts) of your regular-sized peers.

But in reality, it did not do as much as you hoped it would. For example, the "squishy walkway" in the halls was separated by nothing more than a thin line painted on the ground and often zig-zagged across the normal sized walkways, forcing you guys to cross paths with the non-squishy people anyway.

The designated squishy seats and lunch tables fell short just the same. They were often arbitrarily marked sections of seating that squishy students would pile into, with again, nothing more than a painted line separating them and the regular sections. These pitfalls in the system have led to countless instances of you being squashed flat beneath all body parts of the girls of your school. In fact, you've had so much experience with it that you couldn't help but categorize the different attitudes of the regular sized girls of your school. You figured doing this not only would give you a good chuckle but also help you avoid getting crushed as much.

First and foremost were what you called, the "ditzes". These girls were either so dumb or so carefree that it almost seemed like they would forget that they went to school with squishy people at all. The ditzes would constantly forget about the squishy seating and pathways and parade their giant bodies across both. These girls could squish a 1 foot tall guy like you underneath their foot or rump and probably not even notice. Moreover, they would see what they thought were empty seats and simply plop their asses down, often squishing any number of squishy people beneath them. You tried your best to call out to these girls whenever you could, just to make them aware of your presence.

The second group consisted of the indifferent girls, you called them the "so-so's". These girls were aware of the squishies but wouldn't go out of their way to avoid you either. They could either be nice or mean, but either way the squishy people like you weren't a priority. Sometimes you wished they would pay you a bit more respect, but in reality they weren't too bad. Especially compared to the last group...

The third category of girls that threatened your malleable frame were what you referred to as simply "the clique". These ladies resent the fact that the weak, tiny, squishy people get so much special treatment in their school. They will intentionally walk through the tiny paths, sit on the tiny benches, and basically do everything to make your life hell. The clique members were usually popular and could go from simply messing with a squishy person for a second to crushing them flat or eating them. This group you avoided at all costs.

Your awesome girlfriend was one of the few girls who didn't pertain to any of these categories you made, and that was why you liked her so much. You'll admit that's occasionally she can fall into the ditz category, for the most part she was just a regular girl who liked you back.

Surviving amongst all these other ladies was a bit chaotic, but ultimately you assumed that at least you finally have some squishy-favored policies to help you out. After this deep daydream you were abruptly woken up by Talia far above you.

"Ben? For real snap out of it dude we've gotten to school already" she said with a laugh down at you.

"Oh wow sorry Talia I totally spaced out" you responded. She carried you off the bus and to the entrance of school. Immediately you heard the bell ring and a wave of students began migrating to class. What does Talia do?.
1331.title: You scream Talia's name, causing her to tur...

choices: You jump off the seat and land in the aisle, right as more students get on.
You jump into Talia's backpack, and wait for a chance to escape.
You fall off and roll under the seat, but smack into a familiar pair of boots.
1333.content: What other course of action do you choose to pursue?
1333.title: Other Options

choices: Take you home with her
Let you out
13333.content:
You saw Talia had earphones in, so screaming to her wasn't an option. You would've jumped in her book bag, but the opening was too high up. The only reasonable option left was to jump off the seat, so you did. The seat wasn't that far away from the floor of the bus, so you didn't squish to it. The bus lurched forward as soon as you landed and you rolled back under a couple of seats, stopping when you slammed into a familiar black boot.

The gothic girl looked down to see what hit her boot, and saw you there, lying at her feet.

"Oh?" she said smiling with an eyebrow raised.

You looked up and saw her. She had black pigtails with the ends died blue, a very pale face, black eyeshadow, black lipstick, and a black choker necklace. You actually found most goths unattractive, but this one was definitely different. She also wore a black band shirt, black fingerless gloves, and black skinny jeans that displayed her curves perfectly.

She leaned forward and put her hands on the edge of her seat, still eyeing you with a sexy smirk. She raised her boot over you and stepped down, twisting it on top of you slowly. You wanted to scream out in pain, but you were flat as paper and still under her boot.

"I haven't played with one of you squishy guys in a while."

She continued to crush your body under her black boots for the remainder of the bus ride, grinding you into the floor of the bus for almost 20 minutes. As the bus neared the school, she took her foot off of you and moved it to your right. You started reforming but as soon as you got close she slammed her bare foot on your upper body, crushing the air out of your lungs. Her foot landed so your head was between her big and second toes, so when you breathed in, you got a big ole whiff of gothic feet. She twisted her foot on top of you again, this time grinding you into her milk white sole. When she lifted her foot again, you came with it, and she lowered it down back into her tall black boot. The bus came to a stop just as she finished buckling the last buckle on her boot, and she stood up with her book bag, waiting to exit the school bus.

She used you as an insole for the rest of the school day, and without socks, too. Somehow, her foot didn't smell that terrible, and you quickly got used to the pain of being repeatedly stepped on. Most of the time she was sitting down at a desk, so you only had to deal with the smell and whenever she decided to squeeze your head between her toes. Every once in a while she'd give you a good stomp just to feel you squirm.

After several hours of being trampled, squeezed, and stomped on, the school day came to an end, and the colossal goth decided that she should...
13333.title: Goth

choices: Take the girls to school
Go to work
Visit your friends
Look into Miss Harper's disappearance
Head to the gym
14.content:
“You will have a good day”, you told yourself in the mirror. “You are not vulnerable. You are strong. You have to be. You've got two girls to take care of.”

Your name is Trinity Wakeman, and today is the first day you will spend with this odd virus you contracted. You work in quality control at Harper Gummy Works as an inspector, and you made the mistake of handling one of the orbs of gummy with your bare hands. You had done it before and nothing had happened, but on this occasion, the orb you happened to be handling was “sweating”. You weren’t sure why this happened, but you didn’t think anything of it… that is, until one of your co-workers fell back on you down the stairs, squashing you flat beneath her ass. You spent several hours stuck to her rear until you peeled off and you quickly ran to tell your boss, Jack Harper. He told you that his mother, the company’s founder, recently revealed to him that she had a similar situation happen to her when he was a child, but she was keeping the effects at bay with a medication. Unfortunately, she has been missing for over a year and he hasn’t been able to contact her. You didn’t want to upset Mr. Harper by talking about it anymore, so you decided to just live with your illness for the time being. Your husband is in management, but Jack had sent him to South America to attempt to close a deal with a potential distributor. Maybe you can convince him to talk to your boss once he gets back.

“*sigh* I can do this. I just have to be careful and not piss anyone off”, you said to yourself.

What is first on your agenda today?
14.title: Accident at Work

choices: In the locker room before gym class, Harley spots you on her ass.
That night back at home, Amanda spots you and points you out to Harley.
Neither Amanda nor Harley are able to find you for a long time.
141.content:
You needed to take your two wonderful daughters, Harley and Amanda to school before you did anything else today. Harley had a driver’s license, but you figured it would be a quick and easy way to spend a bit of time with your daughters. You had already eaten and gotten dressed, deciding on a black t-shirt and black shorts. You could hear Amanda and Harley getting ready upstairs, so you just waited in the kitchen for them.

Finally, Harley descended the stairs and walked into the room. She was dressed in a cute purple blouse and purple mini-skirt. Her already quite impressive curves strained against the fabric of her outfit, which was probably a bit too snug for her. She was blossoming into an incredibly curvaceous woman, a fact both she was very proud of. Harley took after your creative talents, and participated in many stage shows at school.

Amanda walked in a few minutes after her. She was wearing a loose t-shirt and tight leggings. Despite being twelve years old, she was a bit of an early bloomer, and her more womanly features were starting to take noticeable shape. Amanda had already been asked out on dates by many boys at her school, though that might’ve had a bit to do with her being the star player on both the Soccer and Track teams.

Once both girls had started to eat their breakfast, you told them that you would be out in the car waiting for them. They nodded, and so you left the house and got into the driver’s seat of your car. It was an incredibly hot day outside, and the inside of the car was like a sauna. You wiped some sweat off of your brow, but otherwise just decided to push the thought out of your mind.

After a few minutes, you suddenly remembered what happened to gummy in extreme heat, but it was just a little too late. Your arms were already turning to jelly, and your feet were beginning to melt. You screamed, and tore off your clothes, tossing them into the back seat of the car. You still weren’t cooling down, so you turned on the car and started the air conditioner.

The air conditioner took several precious moments to kick in and spread cool air around the car, and by then your fate was sealed. Your body had dissolved into a puddle of goo resting in the seat. After a few more minutes, your liquid state cooled, and your body hardened, but you were still a small lump of gummy. It would take a while for your full body to regrow.

Just then, you heard the front door of your house slam shut, and you knew that Harley and Amanda were on their way out to the car. Sure enough, the driver’s side door was opened, and your beautiful older daughter stood beside you, her giantess form towering over you. You had never been so terrified of anything in your entire life.

“Huh. That’s weird. Mom did say she was going to drive us, right?” Harley inquired, speaking over her shoulder to Amanda. She had yet to make eye contact with you.

“I think so. Maybe she had an errand to run.”

“Maybe.” Harley shrugged. “Oh well. We’ll be late if we stand around here any longer. I’ll drive.” With that, Harley shifted her body to the side, and began to descend into the car. She had no idea that you were even there on her seat.

You opened your mouth to scream, only to find your lips partially deflated. Only a muffled groan escaped your lips, and the sound was just drowned out by the air conditioner. Your eyes widened in fear as Harley’s gigantic ass grew closer and closer. Her mini-skirt was blown back by the air conditioner, leaving you to stare straight at your daughter’s smooth, tan flesh. She was only wearing a skimpy purple thong, leaving most of her ass exposed!

The crash landing came, and you didn’t stand a chance. Harley plopped down onto the driver’s seat, and your body was smashed under her jiggly, right butt cheek. Your daughter, in her haste to get into the car, and partially because her butt absorbed the shock, didn’t feel a thing. She simply gripped the wheel and grabbed the gear shift.

Amanda slipped into the passenger’s seat, and the two girls began driving off to school. They never once glanced at the back seat and saw your discarded clothes. For the ten minute drive you suffered under Harley’s ass, her entire weight slowly crushing the life out of you. The temperature rose, and sweat dripped off of Harley onto you. The pressure she was exerting began to take it’s toll on you.

You felt your body began to melt once more, and there was nothing you could do about. You tried to scream, wiggle to freedom, or reform, but you had no options available to you. In the simple act of sitting in a seat, your daughter was unknowingly sealing your fate. The sweat of her butt cheek adhered to you like glue, and you to it.

By the time Harley pulled the car into the school parking lot, you were nothing but a tattoo on your daughter’s butt. Thankfully, you had not been fully absorbed into her flesh, but it would definitely take quite a bit of effort to peel you free at this point.

Harley climbed out of the car, her mini-shirt falling back down and covering you up, hiding you from sight. She waved goodbye to Amanda, who sprinted over to the middle school. Harley walked into the high school and off to her first class, blissfully unaware that she was taking her mother along with her.
141.title: Oblivious Harley

choices: You get sent down to the "Clothing" section.
You get sent down to the "Toys" section.
Someone suddenly grabs you from the conveyor belt, but who and why?
142.content:
With an impending sense of dread hanging over you, you got into your car and drove off to work. There were so many ways that things could go horribly wrong while there, but you just had to stay positive and hope that everything would turn out okay. It was your job, and you needed the money. Your children depended on it, so you would do it for them.

You pulled into the parking lot and headed into the factory. You said a few nervous hellos to different people walking in and out, and scurried to the factory floor as quickly as possible. You had been assigned to the drop-off section of the factory today, which was where raw gummy material was unloaded and dropped onto the conveyor belt to be sent across the factory.

The truck of raw gummy material had yet to arrive, so you dropped your purse down and pulled up a chair. Your heart was beating faster than it ever had before, and you were sweating profusely. It was incredibly hot this far back in the factory, and you were soon breathing heavily. You wiped at your forehead, and glanced at the clock against the wall.

Just then, you felt an odd sensation on your hand, and watched in horror as your pinky finger began to melt and drip off of your hand. You gagged, and stood up violently, knocking your chair back against the wall. You dashed over to the nearest water fountain, unknowingly kicking your purse and sending it spinning into the back corner, hidden behind a few boxes.

You dunked your hand under the cool water of the fountain, desperate to keep it from melting to goo. You hadn’t even anticipated this happening, and had no plan for how to deal with this. While you were distracted, a factory employee strolled around the corner, carrying a huge stack of boxes. She couldn’t see where she was going, and so she collided right into you.

You were knocked backwards, and you tripped over your own feet and sprawled out onto the floor. The huge tower of boxes fell down, and you were helplessly crushed underneath. The girl quickly gathered up her boxes, unknowingly stepping all over you. Her sharp heels tore at your flesh, and ripped your clothes to shreds.

Once the girl had stacked her boxes, she finally spotted you. With a curious expression, she peeled you off of the floor, and a quick squeeze convinced her that you were nothing but simple gummy material. She tossed you onto the conveyor belt without a second thought, which thankfully hadn’t begun to move yet. Using all of your energy, you struggled and squirmed, trying to reform.

Before you could make much progress, the truck filled with raw gummy material finally arrive, and it pulled up into place. The back of the truck opened up, and a slide popped out from inside. A giant mountain of gummy orbs rolled down the slide, pilling on top of you, which kept you flat and hidden from sight. With the gummy in place, the girl smacked a button on the control panel, and the conveyor belt roared to life.

You and the rest of the gummy orbs began to be carried down the belt, and you were powerless to do a thing. You mentally screamed and screamed, hoping someone would save you from this fate. Crushed under the weight of the other gummy orbs, you couldn’t reform or escape at all. The worst case scenario had come true.

One by one, mechanical arms picked up the gummy orbs from the pile, and carried them away. Finally, only you were left, and a giant claw grabbed you before you could reform. 144.content:
There was something that had been bothering you ever since your conversation with Jack Harper the previous day. You had had no idea his mother, Trish, had been missing for over a year. That sounded extremely serious, and so you wanted to do anything you could to help your boss. Not just because you wanted some kind of raise or promotion, but because you were a caring person who tried your hardest help everyone in need.

You headed to the factory, though you were able to convince one of the security guards to follow you around as you asked for information and help. The added presence of the security guard helped you to feel safe and secure amidst all of the dangerous machinery and hundreds of employees.

For the first few hours, you were barely able to get any information at all. Trish was Jack Harper’s mother. Trish was an incredibly sexy woman. Trish had disappeared one year ago. These were all things you knew. You were about to give up hope when you stumbled upon an employee named Gloria.

“Miss Harper? I remember her.” Gloria rubbed her chin. “In fact, I remember the last day I saw her.”

“WHAT?” You nearly screamed. “Why didn’t you tell Mister Harper?”

“I didn’t remember until recently. Do you want to hear or not?” Gloria huffed, and you calmed down. You gestured for her to continue.

“Go on.”

“Okay. She was walking around the factory, organizing some boxes and crates. Then, someone came up and told her that a special request was placed to have gummy material personally delivered. Since she wasn’t too busy, Trish saw to the delivery herself. She took a box of custom-made gummy material and left the factory.”

“Do you know where it was that she went?”

“Barely. I think the order was placed by…by a…someone rich. Last name…Courtney? Court…house. That’s it. Courthouse!” Gloria nodded to herself, pleased she had remembered the name. You gave her your thanks, said goodbye to the security guard, and left the factory.

Once in your car, you entered the name “Courthouse” into your phone, and found an address. You raced off to the place where the address directed you to, not even stopping to think of one simple question: If Trish disappeared for a year after going to this house, what made her disappear?

The house in question turned out to be a humongous, sprawling mansion, larger than any you had ever seen. It was beautiful, but there was also something haunting about it. A polite doorman let you park your car out front, and then led you into the house.

“Hello ma’am.” A cute maid bowed as you entered. “My mistress will see you in the art room.” You followed the maid through a twisting series of hallways and corridors, until you finally entered a large art gallery. Hundreds of priceless painting lined the walls. Gold statues guarded each entrance and exit.

In the middle of the room were two comfy chairs. One chair was occupied by a shiningly radiant woman, who oozed charm and innocence. She had long, beautiful blonde hair, and dazzlingly blue eyes. She was wearing a tight, full length dress that hugged her modest but still attractive curves. The dress was a mix of red and tan, forming an interesting and eye-catching combination.

“Good morning!” The woman waved cheerily. “Take a seat.” You walked in, feeling a slight tinge of panic, and sat down. “What can I do for you…miss…”

“Trinity. Trinity Wakeman.” You answered. “What’s your name?”

“Trinity.” The woman smiled, and there was something unsettling about her large grin. “That’s a beautiful name. My name is Elise Courthouse.”

“I’ve come to ask you about a woman named Trish Harper.” You began, and the Elise’s smile wavered. “She apparently was last seen heading to this mansion. Do you know anything about her?”

Elise paused for a moment, and then stuck out her hand, as if to offer a handshake. Feeling awkward, you reached to return the handshake, only for Elise to lash out and grip your arm roughly. She squeezed tightly, and your squishy arm was smushed flat in her iron grip. She let you go, and you sunk back into your seat in horror.

“Oh what irony this is. And to think, I thought today was going to be boring.” Elise laughed, a cold and heartless laugh. “Miss Harper did visit my mansion, one year ago. Imagine my surprise when I give her a hearty handshake, and her hand is flattened within my grip. Of course, I used to be quite…intimate…with her son, so I’m familiar with the whole gummy condition.”

“The box she had delivered contained some red gummy material I had specially ordered, and Trish herself kindly offered to be a bonus dose of tan gummy material. Once she was nice and squishy, I molded the two halves together, and formed this!” Elise stood up, and gestured to her beautiful dress. You screamed, connecting the dots. “This was supposed to be her son, but Miss Harper serves the purpose just as well.

“You monster!” You jumped to your feet and turned around, only to see two maids blocking the door.

“You can’t leave now dear Trinity.” Elise purred. “You know too much. Besides, my mind is already RACING with ideas. I’m getting rather excited.”

You saw that the situation was quickly spiraling out of control. You had to escape this crazy woman before she did something terrible to you. Your children were counting on you to be there for them. However, what choices were even open to you.

"Oh look, it's another possible clients, and she even would take you for as long as possible in heir service!" she shouted excitedly.
In your mind that was on the one hand indeed a good thing, concerning your chronic lack of money. "Hmm maybe i should take riskier jobs for the purpose of bringing food on the table." you thought absent minded while your friend read the remaining service conditions at the end of the mail.

"Well this sounds very promising" she said . She picked you up softly and caring as she was, so you had a clear view on the laptop screen.
What you saw, made you swallow hard:
It was an tall, extremly curvy woman in her early 30s in a very tight (not to say skintight) black bikini with blond hair reaching up to her shoulders. She had a pretty face with shining big blue eyes and a smile every man would melt for.

It was Elvira, the older sister of your former student exchange partner, Agathe (Agy) from Germany.
With fear you thought back to this journey mostly because of this woman and her sister Agathe, a curvy cherry-red headed woman with long hair and a body most woman would die for: She was nearly as curvy as her older sister with a cleavage you could drown in and an ass so big most chairs in the public might be a little to tight for her ( which you unfortunately witnessed under her in a cafe, joining her and her friends for 3 hours! Which happened a few times on this trip, not only because she was imitating her older sisters style to dress, which meant in general: low cut tops, and much skin to see whenever possible for her without her going "against good morals" since they lived in a small town in the nowhere of Bavaria, in the south of Germany. It was also the first time in your life when you came in contact with alcohol, especially during the Oktoberfest, which you experienced squashed in Elvira’s much too tight, nearly bursting Dirndl. What made matters worse was the fact that anytime she spilled beer, it landed right on her huge stuffed cleavage, the beer running down her huge breasts, finding his way into your mouth and all over you (which made you wonder if you absorbed some of the alcohol with your skin) while getting more and more crushed and drunk with Elvira jumping, drinking and singing with her friends. Being that drunk made it even more difficult to communicate with them for you, and leading to even worse outcomes of communication.

Both of them seemed to have the strange idea that there was literally no option to squashing you or turning you into their clothes to stay “safe” with them. This might have been partly your fault, since you didn’t speak the language very well.
Mostly these accidents were a result of a huge language barrier, since you didnt speak any german and they spoke rarely English, but they were claiming that they understood you mostly well. In general you couldn’t find out much of these two girls personalities, since you only stayed for one week, mostly squashed by their curves. But you couldn’t help and think that Agy knew more English than she admitted. While you read her mail, you shuddered even more since she planned on going on vacation in Hungary with you joining her as her Bikini bottom. “Did they find about your business or is this just a strange coincidence”? You wondered. “What would they make out of this, since they already thought you are treated like a bra, thong, cushion for safekeeping even before they found your website?” your thoughts were running through your head. “ I don’t have to do this crazy trip first to Germany and after that with heir (or them?) to Hungary” you calmed yourself down.

“ WOW Europe… I really envy you for such a nice destination” Chelsea suddenly said. “ But I don’t think it will turn out profitable with all the costs the vacation adds to our normal running costs, unless we ask her to take you even longer” she smiled at you enthusiastically. “Lets see what my calculation program says about the amount of time for this job!”
You were just shocked about your good friends reaction, was she really throwing all your safety principels like the maximum of a week or the distance out of the window, just to make more money??

With that she grabbed you from the laptop keybord, unfortunately closing her first around you, which made it impossible for you to protest, and tipping something in the program.
After a never ending moment of fear and tension the computer showed the outcome of the calculation.


1) 3 Weeks from now it is, this includes being in Germany in October...

2) The System showed an error when Chelsea tried to book the order, but what kind of error ( does the system protect you or is it somehow even worse?)

155.content:
You open your eyes this morning to find a very familiar sight, a large pantie clad rear slamming down on your position, flattening you out completely before ascending into the standing position of your 'girl friend'.

"Your welcome for the sweet wake up call honey, there's more for you if you get in gear on time but I will not be waiting up today if you run behind you know what's in store for you." her sickly sweet voice rolled over you as she skipped out of the room. You reformed and got dressed reluctantly walking out of your room to observe the girl who was sharing your apartment. Still in nothing but a long T-shirt and panties that barley covered her expansive booty she was cooking breakfast she was Candice Love a collage freshman like you, and some would think she is the perfect girl, but they didn't know her like you did.


You are Jesse Iron: 20 years old, Born with an Ironic name and Three older sisters you had been about as successful as you could be, standing only two and a half feet tall and a body that buckled under pressure. You managed to get into a nice collage on scholarship, due in part to you 'disability' and you hoped you could start a 'new' life without all the things that you normally dealt with, unfortunately it wasn't meant to be. at first everything seemed to be going alright baring the science teacher who seamed like she had an unhealthy(for you) interest in you and the hottest girl in your class wanted to talk to you in the first week, but as luck would have it that girl is Candice.


Candice Love: 20 years old and smoking hot. She has long dark red hair, with green eyes, nice big DD boobs, and a booty that puts them to shame. she isn't all that tall being only around 5'2" but that's more than double your own height, she would be a great girlfriend if it wasn't for one little personality quirk. Candice is really into S&M and she doesn't exactly give you a choice in weather or not to participate, a partner that will not break no matter what you put them through is hard to come by and you find it hard to argue with her. She wants to really test the boundaries of what you can take and she always gets super hot when she's squishing you. You got swept into this 'relationship' with Candice and you haven't worked up the courage to try and leave, no telling what she would do to you then.
155.title: Jesse Iron, one sided relationship

info.brief_description: A new tale to the Squishy universe
info.description:
This story is a part of Derpatron’s Squishy “universe”. If you have not heard of it, I recommend you check it out before continuing. There are some key things you need to know about the story to fully enjoy it. \/Links are below\/

Squishy Boy- http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1938091-A-Squishy-Boy/map/

Malleable MILF- http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2095179-Malleable-MILF

Squishy Girl- http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2038474-A-Squishy-Girl

Gummy Flu- http://www.writing.com/main/view_item/item_id/2095148-The-Gooey-Flu-Ch-2-Trish-G...

Oh, and don't forget to check out Kentwolf's stuff. She has plenty of stuff to keep you entertained as well as Squishy Teen, which takes place after Squishy Boy.
\/ \/

Squishy Teen-
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1975029-A-Squishy-Teen/map/

This story has four main different characters, and take place during the events of Squishy Girl. If you have any questions, message me, or Derp, and we will try to help you if we can.

Sarah Mcbride (17), after an incident involving a sick, not so ordinary girl from her school, Sarah caught some kind of virus or flu from her on the last day of her year in highschool. The next morning, she wakes up to find herself squishy and malleable. She lives with her oblivious mother Ellis (36), her father Price (37)... but he's often away on business for some clothing factory. She also lives with her devil of a twin sister Kasey (17), and her perverted little brother John (13). Her best friends are Ashely Williams (16) and Jane Priest (17).

Thomas Malthus(41) lived a moderately normal life for being 2ft tall and being extremely malleable. Ever since he was adopted at the young age of 7, he never found out who his parents were. As a kid, his foster-family treated him like an actual human being, and never took advantage of his squishy form. Skipping toward 32 years, Thomas(41) had married his long time girlfriend Mckayla Jacobson(39) and had two kids: Ryan(14) and a spoiled-rotten girl named Vicky(17). Luckily, his condition never passed onto his kids.

Ben Peterson(18) was born with ability to be squished, frozen, liquidated, and even baked into other things. With a bit of luck, he managed to survive being underfoot a family of giants. Due to his condition (and constantly losing part of his mass in accidents), he averages out at about a foot tall. He never let that stop him though, and he started to date his best friend Talia(19). He lives with his father Max Peterson(37) and his step-mother Catherine(28), though they are leaving for a vacation without him in London, England, leaving him with his annoying step-brother Chris(10).

Trinity Wakeman(42) is a mother that supports her two kids Amanda(12) and Harley(16) by working full-time at a clothing factory for Harper’s Gummy Works as a Gummy inspector. Her husband Alex(40) works at the same factory, but works in management. Her best friends are Becky Gilmore(37) and Stacy Alexander(26). One day she touched a gummy orb that was “sweating” with her bare hands on accident. Next morning, she hand found herself to be very malleable.

A few rules before we start:

PLEASE use proper grammar. I could tell you how many times I've been reading a story like this and see “She fond u, and now u her slave” and end the story off there. I mean, I see what you were trying to go for, but don't be that guy. Nobody likes that guy.

Please, no one sentence chapters. Unless of course it's a bridging chapter. (do try to limit those)

Characters can not die. Simple as that.

No links please... It gets kinda aggravating.

Story is rated 18+ so yeah... fair warning. I'm cool with just about anything.
